item.title: IDLE BOSS Rush
item.description: Game Description In IDLE BOSS Rush, the starting point for creating a powerful kingdom is a lifeless wasteland. The main task is to turn a modest camp into a prosperous city, gathering an army to defeat giant bosses. Each battle with the enemy is a serious test that requires either time or competent tactics. Further development depends on the management of the population and resources. The economic foundation is important for the maintenance of an army that can reflect the onslaught of huge monsters and expand the boundaries of the settlement.

item.title: Rose of Wind
item.description: Game Description Rose of Wind offers to take care of an old tavern inherited from his grandfather. This once flourished institution now needs a caring hand to restore its reputation and again make the center of attraction for travelers. A variety of guests will knock on the door, from tired merchants to brave adventurers, each with his own fate. The atmosphere depends on the decisions of the manager: you can feed them added to them, provide an overnight stay or support the conversation at the hearth.

item.title: Cloverpit
item.description: Game Description Cloverpit puts the protagonist in a rusty camera equipped only with a slot machine and an ATM. Each round sets a clear goal: to accumulate enough coins to pay a constantly growing debt to an invisible kidnapper. This cycle of risky bets works as a debt simulator, in which non -payment leads to an immediate loss. A closed, surreal environment creates an atmosphere of a psychological horror, turning a solitary passage into a desperate attempt to escape from the hellish Western.

item.title: Buggos 2
item.description: Game Description In Buggos 2, the key goal is to conquer planets under the control of a reasonable hive. In the role of this collective intelligence, the player directs the beetle waves to human settlements. The task is to crush the defense of a pure biomass and completely exterminate humanity on all six worlds of the solar system. The destruction campaign consists in sending successive swarms to destroy fortified positions until the target world goes under the control of the swarm.

item.title: Hotel Magnate
item.description: Game Description Hotel Magnate is a hotel manager simulator. You need to manage the whole process: from building a building and choosing the color of the walls - to the hire of workers and the fight against emergency situations. You can manage a luxurious hotel in the center of the metropolis, a small motel by the road or a sunny resort with a pool. In the Hotel Magnate, everything will begin with the construction of the building: the foundation, walls, rooms and stairs.

item.title: Forsaker: Dingding and Blade
item.description: Game Description Forsaker: Dingding and Blade begins with a regular mission for two young men, which develops into a Cannibal Odyssey on the Hel continent. The local world is divided into three fractions: people, the Church of the Divine Body and the devouring flesh of the outcasts. Players explore this society, constantly faced with the main choice: to eat another or become prey. The plot reveals deep conspiracies and casts doubt on the established order and the very nature of survival.

item.title: Aethermancer
item.description: Game Description Aethermancer - an adventure in which the player in the role of a powerful Ethermant will have to explore the constantly changing world of the Terast. The main task is to create an indestructible connection with mythical creatures that fell into an endless cycle of death and rebirth. The protagonist needs to assemble a detachment of three monsters and conduct them through dangerous procedurally generated locations of destroyed ruins.

item.title: Aztecs The Last Sun
item.description: Game Description In Aztecs The Last Sun, the player becomes the ruler of Tenochtitlan, a great state that can win the whole world. The user relies on many tasks, as the head of his own power. He has to develop a city, increase military power and improve the quality of life of citizens. Having taken the control over the Aztecs, you will need to go through the three great centuries, to dominate in the nearest territories and write new pages in world history.

item.title: Celestial Empire
item.description: Game Description Celestial Empire offers to go to the Han dynasty when the Chinese empire was one of the most powerful in the world. Here, the user is given the role of the Governor of the province, who was personally chosen by the emperor. Now, everything must be done in order to make this place better and provide a high standard of living for people. And given that there are a lot of ways for the development of the structure, you can not limit yourself to a single strategy, but try different options.

item.title: Crypt Crawler
item.description: Game Description The plot of Crypt Crawler starts after the fall of the heroes of the kingdom under the onslaught of the hordes of undead, poured from the open gates of the underworld. The mission to seal the fault is assigned to a lonely mechanic goblin. The character will have a 16-level descent into the dungeon in a dungeon in a monsters to achieve and close the portal. Each stage offers a new tactical task, forcing the goblin to climb deeper into the enemy territory for the sake of fulfilling the mission.

item.title: Global Magnates: Shipping Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Global Magnates: Shipping Tycoon sets the gamers the task of creating a marine empire built around a new technology for its time - a sea container. The main goal is to turn a small enterprise into a dominant logistics corporation. The process includes competition with rivals under the control of AI, using hostile absorptions, buying assets and price wars to capture the market share. Success requires the acquisition of key ports, expand the flotilla and investment in a shipyard to maintain superiority in a changeable economic situation, where each solution affects the situation.

item.title: Pompeii: The Legacy
item.description: Game Description Pompeii: The Legacy sets the gamers the task of leading the Roman family and restore the city 20 years after the eruption of Vesuvius. The project requires to take into account the different needs of the patricians, plebeians and slaves, since each group has its own goals. Players from scratch lay streets, erects forums and build aqueducts. Any infrastructure or social decision affects the position of the family and determines its legacy for centuries, generating the consequences for future generations.

item.title: The House of Tesla
item.description: Game Description The House of Tesla offers Gamer the role of Nikola Tesla, who was stuck alone on the territory of his most ambitious project - the abandoned complex of Wardencliffe. The main task is to study idle industrial equipment and reveal a secret that has entailed the current desolation. History is presented on behalf of the inventor exploring the key points that led to the construction and subsequent fall of the famous tower.

item.title: Endless Legend 2
item.description: Game Description In Endless Legend 2, the factions fight in the variable ocean world on the verge of collapse. The task of the gamer is to conduct its civilization through expansion, policy and military clashes, revealing secrets hidden in the bowels of the planet. The world itself is transformed: cataclysms force the oceans to retreat, exposing new lands for conquest. It is necessary to base cities, develop economic infrastructure and command troops in step -by -step tactical battles to conquer opponents and consolidate on a changing map.

item.title: Northwind
item.description: Game Description The mercenary in Northwind chooses a specific hunt, after which it plans the route through a dangerous, frozen territory. The main task is to travel around these lands in order to find and defeat formidable monsters. In the breaks between the signs, the avant -navpost serves as a central base for preparation and improvements. The gameplay is built on the implementation of such tasks, overcoming powerful bosses and collecting resources to strengthen subsequent attempts.

item.title: A Gentlemen's Dispute
item.description: Game Description In A Gentlemen’s Dispute, up to 8 fighters fight in multiplaying competitions for the title of the last survivor. They use various weapons, including bits, bazuki, guns and placed traps to eliminate opponents. The action takes place on closed arenas for a simple purpose - to eliminate all other opponents. Each match is a dynamic battle with a third -person view, focusing on a direct collision and tactical placement for victory.

item.title: Ale Abbey
item.description: Game Description Ale Abbey is a unique world where users will be able to build, manage and expand the monastery specializing in the cooking of the Holy Elya. Title does not make it possible to use ready -made recipes, forcing to experiment and create your own varieties of beer from scratch. The users will have to comprehend the art of brewing, adjusting the temperature of the grout, the quality and amount of beer in order to achieve the perfect result.

item.title: Flick Shot Rogues
item.description: Game Description Flick Shot Rogues places heroes on a desktop field, where the outcome of each course depends on the laws of physics. Players plan, aim and start their characters, like balls in billiards or pinball. The task is to clean the location from opponents, causing chain reactions and thoughtful clashes. Success requires a combination of tactical insight with an understanding of inertia to conquer various biomes of the island, including the full trap of the jungle.

item.title: Lord Ambermase
item.description: Game Description The Universe in Lord Ambermaze succumbed to a terrible curse that stopped the normal course of time. The main character is a guy named Zin, who owns an ancient magic relic under the name “sword of movement.” Thanks to the enchanted weapon, the protagonist gets the opportunity to move freely around the world and resist the dangers that the Lord Ambermase prepares. Users will have to save the kingdom and the princess, which is in the imprisonment of the criminal.

item.title: Shapehero Factory
item.description: Game Description Shapehero Factory combines the elements of the simulator of the factory, rogelitis and Tower Defense. Players build huts for the mass production of heroes who automatically fight with the waves of enemies. The goal is to defeat the great disaster sealed in the book of magic. With the help of minions, collect a variety of characters from basic figures found on a magic scroll. Circles and triangles form soldiers, and circles and squares - sprites.

item.title: Rana Card
item.description: Game Description The player plays the role of a farm manager working on the TimeTech corporation. Its task is to achieve planned indicators established by management. The whole process is built on the formation of the deck and the competent use of cards, each of which has its own time in time. Each move has to decide whether it is worth taking another card, risking the exhausted time limit. This element of excitement and balanced risk is the central part of the gameplay.

item.title: Pinata Go Boom
item.description: Game Description Pinata Go Boom throws a player in the role of an employee armed with bat and corporate ambitions. The main task is to break the Pignata in a series of industrial premises. To go to the next zone, it is necessary to destroy all containers. Broken Pignata releases a variety of toys and prey to be collected. The accumulated catch becomes the basis for career growth and development of skills in the hierarchy.

item.title: Misty Judgment
item.description: Game Description Misty Judgment begins with the awakening of the protagonist, qi and, from a nightmare in a strange reality without clear memories. Unable to confirm his own personality, he investigates a series of murders filed in the video format with real actors. The main task is the search and analysis of evidence, the comparison of facts and the calculation of the criminal. Any solution affects further events, and the future of the protagonist depends on the deductive abilities of the player.

item.title: Coal LLC
item.description: Game Description In Coal LLC, the player is engaged in the extraction of constantly growing coal volumes to perform a daily quota, and the failure leads to the end of the passage. The activity begins with one Old Kirki, forcing to descend deep underground to achieve production goals before dark. The underground world is updated daily, offering a new location of resources requiring quick development. As the company’s industrial activity expands, the environment begins to demonstrate signs of decline.

item.title: It
item.description: Game Description It’s Time Your Majesty is a strategy in which the fate of the whole dynasty falls on the shoulders of the ruler, where each decision is made through the choice of cards. In the role of the monarch, it is necessary to rule the state, trying to achieve prosperity and protect subjects from numerous threats. On the way to greatness, both external enemies and internal problems that require a balanced approach will stand.

item.title: Mage and Monsters 2
item.description: Game Description Mage and Monsters 2 opens the battlefield on which the hired hero leads the army to an automatic battle. During these battles, the player actively supports his forces, using spells with a view of the top. Further development is determined by the strategic elections accepted between the battles and focused on the strengthening of the hero’s personal power, strengthen the troops or increase the potential of magic. The decisions made directly affect the effectiveness of autonomously acting units and determine the course of fantasy war.

item.title: Trainatic
item.description: Game Description Trainatic offers the player to pump wagons to collect materials when driving along a railway canvas. The key task is the constant expansion of the locomotive, starting with one engine. The accession of new components increases its length and capabilities, facilitating the promotion of the procedurally generated path. This process allows you to accumulate raw materials for subsequent construction. Over time, the composition is transformed from the initial form into a massive structure that occupies a significant part of the screen.

item.title: Star Fire: Eternal Cycle
item.description: Game Description Star Fire: Eternal Cycle triggers a race in which the main character makes jerks and combo against alien enemies in futuristic 2.5D-gallocations. The gameplay is built on a combination of sid-scrolling battles in the spirit of Beat ‘Em Up and progression systems characteristic of Roguelite. Each attempt to clean the level is distinguished by a unique arrangement of enemies and procedurally generated branches of tracks. The player’s movement and attacks are designed for direct control, requiring evasions and accurate calculation of the time to win the cyberpanic opponents in the destroyed environment.

item.title: Overlooting
item.description: Game Description Overlooting combines the alliance of three characters against the decaying dark power. The group includes Maximilian, a hero from a noble family, Liz, a thief wanted in many countries, and a shadow is a mysterious creature that was previously considered a source of damage. Their main task is the extraction of equipment controlled through the system of inventory within the framework of the crog. Such a structure guarantees that each attempt to complete the mission sets different conditions before the detachment, changing the path to victory in every new game.

item.title: Dungeon Warfare 3
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Warfare 3 offers the player to construct a deadly obstacle strip, laying out the landscape tiles and cutting out dangerous paths for the advancing adventurers. The main activity is the deployment of an expanded arsenal of traps and cunning mechanisms intended for inflicting injuries, wounds and disorientation of enemy detachments. You can directly form a battlefield, erecting walls or swarms and thereby directing opponents to strategically arranged protective structures.

item.title: PLAN B: TerRaform
item.description: Game Description In PLAN B: TerraForm, it is necessary to take up the colonization of the planet. To do this, it is necessary to collect resources on the surface of the continent and debug a system for supplying production to cities for further production. The most important resource is settlers. It is required to do everything you need to make the planet suitable for people to live. For example, you need to heat the atmosphere to the correct temperature, create water bodies, plant trees and much more.

item.title: Chip N Clawz vs. The Brainioids
item.description: Game Description In Chip N Clawz vs. The Brainioids will have to collect a resource called Brainum, build bases and manage the army of bots against alien invaders. The gamer takes under the direct control of the inventor of the chip or robocot Clause with a third -person view, leading the assault in order to return the abducted crystals. The main conflict is tied to the Braynioids who took resources into their engraving spheres.

item.title: Beyond the Map
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Map begins with a shipwreck on the outskirts of the known seas, setting the player an immediate task of survival in a mysterious territory. The development of the character is complete without a class system: increasing the level of skills opens up new basic abilities. The search for rare folios with spells around the world provides access to incredible forces, additionally determining the capabilities of the hero.

item.title: Knightica
item.description: Game Description Knightica instructs commanders to gather a detachment and strategically arrange its fighters to use combat synergies. Units have unique abilities activated by accurate arrangement and turning on the battlefield. The player forms these forces from various fractions, such as the legions of undead or adherents of the guild of magicians, before their entry into automated battles. The assembled army then goes on a hike through a series of trials in order to free the kingdom.

item.title: Worldwide rush
item.description: Game Description Worldwide Rush is immersed in the management of the global passenger corporation. The start of the career begins with the construction of the main office and the selection of equipment from an extensive park in 120 models, including cars, trains, planes and ships. The main goal of this gaming project is to connect thousands of settlements with profitable routes, based on dynamic demand. To increase profits, you can invest in the hotel business and advertising campaigns, while the entire logistics system requires constant improvement.

item.title: Planetary Life
item.description: Game Description In Planetary Life, you will find yourself in the role of a planetary architect. In this Simulator, you get divine control over the barren world. Create mountains and cut the valleys, erupt volcanic rage or create gentle slopes. Create the perfect environment: adjust the heat of the nuclei, work with gases in the atmosphere and control precipitation. Planetary life is not only the formation of land. You will also become a shepherd of life itself.

item.title: A FISTFUL of YANKEES
item.description: Game Description A FISTFUL of Yankes offers the player to lead a detachment of government soldiers sent to the American West in 1865 to combat desperate criminals and robber barons. On this post -war frontier, life and death solve weapons. The key task of the unit is to establish order by tracking the robbers attacking the settlers. However, this mission draws the fighters into a much larger conflict with serious consequences, going beyond initial orders.

item.title: Dice Gambit
item.description: Game Description Step -by -step battles in Dice Gambit allow us to plunge into tactical competitions, where the victory determines the cubes that affect the management of the characters. The game is designed for strategic miscalculations where a variety and excitement makes a bone throw. Each result on dits permits to obtain a limited number of actions for heroes fighting on combat arenas. The characters will be able to move, perform interactions with the environment or inflict damage to the opponents on the field.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Definitive Edition - this is a single package uniting the original project and all its additions. Players have to accept the command of one of the 9 factions, from the technological tau and the mysterious Eldar to the ruthless forces of Chaos, and lead them in cruel conflicts on more than 100 cards. This publication contains four full -fledged campaigns offering both linear plots and nonlinear conquests of entire planetary systems.

item.title: Cleanfall
item.description: Game Description Cleanfall puts a player at the head of the harvesting robot, the only function of which is to maintain cleanliness in the house. This simple task becomes a planetary mission after one techie brought the world closer to his sun. The cataclysm that happened covered the surface with a whirlwind of dust and death, making a restraint of order impossible. In order to bring cleanliness in his house again, the mechanism must first correct the whole world, going down to the underground layers of the planet to start his work.

item.title: Era One
item.description: Game Description Era One puts the player into the future with the destroyed political system of mankind. After a catastrophic gravitational event that paralyzed mass migration, societies on board the giant space cities enter the war for stinging resources. The mutated bioshahters pose a constant threat to the entire solar system. In these conditions, a woman named Alya de Chars is trying to get a source of energy for a secret ship, striving for a new beginning.

item.title: Wild West Supermarket Simulator
item.description: Game Description Wild West Supermarket Simulator immerses the player at the head of the universal store in 1850. The action takes place in a ghost town, empty after the end of the gold fever and the majority of their inhabitants. The gamer arrives to lead a business, which is only a shadow of former greatness. The main task is to restore the enterprise from scratch, laying out goods on shelves and managing supplies to revive an abandoned location.

item.title: Demigoddess!
item.description: Game Description Demigoddess! - A step -by -step strategic game, with sessions calculated for completion for 1 hour. The procedural generation each time creates a unique world, changing the continents, the deployment of the enemy and the distribution of resources. The world consists of 64 regions, and to win the player needs to win over 32 of these territories. You can command armies of 20 different fractions, including over 450 species of soldiers and monsters.

item.title: Frosthaven
item.description: Game Description Frosthaven is a digital adaptation of a board game that puts players at the head of a detachment of mercenaries in the northern settlement. This tactical role strategy uses step -by -step battles on a hexagonal map. You can go through the campaign missions alone or in an online cooperative with three other gamers. The action is unfolding on a border known by harsh conditions and dangerous inhabitants, constantly challenging the survival of the group.

item.title: Game of Grass
item.description: Game Description Game of Grass begins with a call from a neighbor who offended the player’s lawn. The main task is to demonstrate superiority through the cultivation of the remarkable courtyard. The process includes methodical mowing of vegetation using a variety of tools. Gamers acquire upgrades to increase the efficiency of their equipment, which allows you to quickly clear the territory. The goal is to achieve the status of the legend of haircuts of grass by methodically improving the site, and advance in this simulator is linearly and focused on tangible results.

item.title: Mashina
item.description: Game Description Mashina immerses the player in a solitary adventure, where under his control is a robot with a mission to restore his native world. The basis of this project is the methodical study of the subsoil to collect valuable materials necessary for the survival of the whole settlement. All fossils found are used to help the community of other mechanisms, contributing to the gradual revival of their destroyed house.

item.title: Prospector
item.description: Game Description Prospector begins with arrival at someone else’s world, having only a set of tools at its disposal. The primary task is to collect the planet’s resources for the construction of the basis for the base. Players build structures, explore the environment, and then establish automated production lines. For construction, everything is used, from primitive materials to unknown alien substances found on the landscape. Gradually, a simple avantopost turns into a complex object with an optimized working process.

item.title: Reflex Unit: Strike Ops
item.description: Game Description Reflex Unit: Strike Ops immerses in the future, destroyed by cataclysm and captured by powerful corporations. The player is headed by an elite detachment opposing the despotistical corporation Neotech, operating the remnants of civilization. The key gameplay consists in managing specialized equipment during various tactical operations. The tasks include daring rescue sorties, collecting key resources and direct attacks on enemy bases to undermine the power of the regime and struggle for freedom of the population.

item.title: Inkborn
item.description: Game Description Inkborn represents a card combat system based on the consistent use of glyphs for a tactical effect. Gamers have cards according to special symbols, activating chain results during step -by -step clashes with otherworldly creatures. Such a gameplay is the basis for promotion. The scene is a world created from ink, folded paper and metal containing a hidden story for disclosure. The narrative unfolds as the expeditions are completed and the tasks set.

item.title: Village Tale
item.description: Game Description Village Tale represents the construction simulator designed for continuous work on the user desktop. The gamer will have to build structures, create goods and engage in commerce to expand its village from the very foundation. The task is to open new industries and increase the number of community. The gameplay proceeds in real time, allowing the village to function even when you are busy with other matters. The activity of residents and the development of resources go continuously, creating a permanent world for management.

item.title: The Great Villarance: Strategy of Lily
item.description: Game Description The Great Villarance: Strategy of Lily is a step -by -step tactical game about the Duchess of Scarlet, faced with accusation of regicide. Accused of the murder of the emperor, she concludes an alliance with Lily, the captain of the aircraft, a stream. Together they declare the war of the empire, becoming the first military streamers on the continent. The conflict grows due to a clash of impulsiveness and cold pragmatism.

item.title: Slidemagi
item.description: Game Description Slidemagi is a duel between the two magicians on the 10x10 board, where units move by shifting the entire grid lines. In one move, the player performs one action: moves a row or applies a spell. This solution is central to the tactical pattern of battle. Following this, all controlled fighters on the field simultaneously attack in four main directions in the presence of goals. This tactical game offers several modes for single and multiplayer competitions.

item.title: Monument Valley 3
item.description: Game Description In the Monument Valley 3, players will go on a new journey, leading a student of Nur through a world built from optical illusions and mobile architecture. The main goal is to comprehend the meaning of sacred light, moving along locations with changeable gravity. For advance, it is necessary to directly manipulate buildings, rotate entire levels and change the perspective, paving routes through impossible geometry. Features of the surrealist adventure Nur:

item.title: The King Is Watching
item.description: Game Description The King Is Watching is a unique combination of strategy, Roguelike and controls. In this Title, users take on the role of the ruler, whose presence affects the productivity of the kingdom. The central mechanics revolves around the strength of the gamer’s gaze, which dictates the effectiveness of various tasks, including resources, military training and much more. At any moment in time, the ruler must choose what to focus on, balancing between agriculture, mining and protection from external threats.

item.title: Kingdom Ascension
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Ascension puts the player in the lord position with the task of creating his own possession in an empty plot of land. The initial stage includes a systematic collection of provisions and materials - basic elements for any settlement. These assets then go to the construction of the first buildings to create a stronghold in the world. Subsequently, the focus shifts the recruitment of military detachments that form an army to protect native lands and spread the influence of the outside.

item.title: DUST RADERS
item.description: Game Description Dust Raiders puts the player in the role of the manager on the lawless, post -apocalyptic wasteland, where control over resources is the main task. The plot originates after the Sawblade attack, which led to the loss of the oil refinery, the death of the Viktor’s ally and the dissolution of the original team. Left without fuel and equipment, it is necessary to collect a functional machine from scrap metal to start recovery.

item.title: Fill up the Hole
item.description: Game Description Fill up the Hole puts the player in the role of the overseer of the anti -utopian settlement, built around the only economic activity: transformation of waste into profit. The population of the peons independently collects garbage for discharge into the central pit - this process generates resources for growth. The main task is to build and expand the village, as well as strategic placement of structures to increase the volume of garbage production and its subsequent disposal.

item.title: Forest Heroes
item.description: Game Description Forest Heroes combines Tower Defense elements with Roguelike Deckbuilding. The place of action is the Nokflufol, the forest that flourished under the auspices of the elves who own mushroom magic. However, the offended oak imposed a curse on the ground, distorting it. In the role of an elf-guardian, the player’s task is to rally the allies-living ones for rebuke. The main mission is to defend the operating base and clean the surrounding area from the influence of the curse in order to restore the area to its original state.

item.title: He is coming
item.description: Game Description He is coming is a world where forgotten evil awakens. The king of demons is rebelled, carrying the promise of death with him. The users have to find powerful artifacts and weapons to resist this formidable enemy. In the afternoon you are exploring the kingdom, collecting resources and honing your skills, and at night you fight off its minions and prepare for the next monstrous test. The clock is constantly ticking, and each solution can mean the difference between survival and destruction.

item.title: The Necromincer's Tale
item.description: Game Description The Necromincer’s Tale is a role -playing game in the setting of dark fantasy. The adventure is presented by a top-distance. It is a nobleman to manage a nobleman living in the world of an alternative of the 18th century. The tale of the necromancer is a mystical story full of political conspiracies, dark knowledge and thirst for revenge. Exploring surrounding, everything may not be at all the same as it seems initially.

item.title: The Wandering Village
item.description: Game Description Once in The Wandering Village on an infected planet, people have no choice but to poison the back of a giant creature that can move in the process. The urban planning simulator is made in a post -apocalyptic setting and offers to lead a small society that saved, settling on the essence and gradually rebuild the new world. Having moved to the virtual universe, the user observes as some toxic substances that appeared due to mysterious plants, quickly spread on the ground by giving out toxic disputes.

item.title: Demonic Mahjong
item.description: Game Description Demonic Mahjong races Majong bones with a horn structure. Players have to use chips from their hands to collect combinations that meet the established rules for counting glasses. However, the main task is beyond the scope of simple accumulation of points. The final goal is to build a hand and strategies that allow you to defeat the main boss, which turns every entry into preparation for the final battle.

item.title: Everstrife
item.description: Game Description Everstrife combines a battle with a look from the top and strategy for building a deck, placing players in locations filled with shells. Development depends on the system of skills based on Roguelike maps and elements. The central place in the gameplay is occupied by a synthesis mechanic that allows you to combine basic abilities. With 30 fundamental spells, gamers can generate more than 2000 of their options, so that each race offers new tactical solutions.

item.title: Stronghold Crusader: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Stronghold Crusader: Definitive Edition puts the player in the historical context of the Crusades, where the armies in the desert lands will have to be commanded. The gameplay is focused on building a castle economy, managing production and creating troops for siege battles. The plot campaigns illuminate conflicts from the point of view of Richard the Lion Heart and Saladin, the ruler of the Ayubid dynasty. Gamers have to withstand 20 and lords, each of which uses unique fortresses and tactical approaches for warfare.

item.title: Motemancer
item.description: Game Description Motemancer is a game about automation in which players act on 6 intersecting elemental plans, procedurally generated and affordable in real time. The action takes place on a hexagonal network that serves as the basis for the construction of alchemical structures and the design of logistics systems for resource management. Gamers saturate the ingredients and combine various components, which directly changes the world around him. The art of managing elements and matter in Motemacer:

item.title: Seacret 1
item.description: Game Description Seacret 1 is a sandbox in the 17th century Caribbean, where players are engaged in trade, battles or management. The economy here functions in real time, and the prices and volumes of goods in each individual city are constantly fluctuating. The journey begins with one modest tartan, but over time you can expand your flotilla to three vessels, including fast slices or more impressive galleons. Strategic planning of commercial routes is becoming a key basis for the accumulation of wealth, vital for conducting operations in an extensive open world.

item.title: Aurora Defense
item.description: Game Description Aurora Defense combines Roguelike Deckbuilding with Tower-Defense gameplay with the construction of the base. The player’s task is to build defensive structures in the last stronghold of light, restraining the onslaught of the advancing darkness. The protection of the last goddess is the main goal of the mission throughout the passage. The tool for all actions is maps that allow you to place new buildings, modernize existing buildings and use spells.

item.title: Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War
item.description: Game Description Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War is a political strategic simulation that has put you at the head of the Soviet Union in its last decade. The project demonstrates a country encountered with pressure from the internal fractions and external forces requiring changes. As the head of state, you lead the economy, external relations and determine the internal course of the Union. The gameplay includes interaction with other nations, the use of diplomatic channels, or the outbreak of proxy conflicts to expand influence.

item.title: OUR WAR: FirePower Suppression
item.description: Game Description OUR WAR: FirePower Suppression is a flight shooter in which players use continuous fire to neutralize enemy forces. The story of the Title is submitted after 30 plot chapters, describing the war between the human faction and the essence of the fat bird from the parallel world. Combat operations take place on various three -dimensional locations, each with a unique relief that affects the tactical approach to clashes.

item.title: Power The Future
item.description: Game Description Power The Future throws the player under the control of one of 7 nations, including the USA, Germany and China. The game is developing step by step from 2025 to 2038, where the main task is to provide the state’s energy needs. Players achieve this, developing technologies and creating a power grid that extends through national and international territories. This system requires the provision of consumption units located in its own and surrounding territories.

item.title: Wildrise
item.description: Game Description Wildrise represents the world where concrete has captured natural soil, leaving the silent space. A forest keeper named Floof is awakening from a dream that lasted for centuries and sees this altered landscape. The main task of the player is to help this keeper systematically revive nature, destroying artificial coatings. This is achieved through step -by -step mechanics of arranging and combining mushrooms, flowers and animals on the field, while each combination helps to restore land and fauna.

item.title: EVERY DAY WE FIGHT
item.description: Game Description EVERY DAY WE FIGHT places a group of resistance fighters in a temporary anomaly during an alien invasion. The world and its population were frozen in one moment, and a small detachment remains active, falling into a cycle, where death is not the end. Each time the team dies, time is unwinded back, but the acquired skills and knowledge are preserved with every new round. Players have to lead these people in urban locations in real time, turning into a step -by -step regime for tactical skirmishes with aliens forces.

item.title: Chosen War
item.description: Game Description Chosen War puts the player in the role of the chosen one who is instructed to gather and novels the army in the archipelago. It is necessary to move around the fogs covered in fog and enter into battle with enemy forces using the tactical placement of detachments. Each adventure is built around the study of the world and provisions. The ultimate goal is a collision with the supreme priest on the final location.

item.title: Frog Jump
item.description: Game Description Frog Jump puts players under the control of amphibians with the aim of vertical climbing through the three -dimensional world. They have to move according to a complex design, using jumps and climbing to go from one site to another. The entire level is designed around this movement up, representing a continuous navigation task. The first princess’s kiss receives a victory that reached the top. This platformer can be held alone or in a multi -user competition for 8 competitors over the network.

item.title: Click and Conquer
item.description: Game Description Click and Conquer represents a resource management system through military operations. The main gameplay is based on the discharge of bombs on the grid to detect disguised enemy detachments. Each opened unit brings currency that serves as a central resource for further development. The received funds are distributed to increase passive income and an increase in the destructive force of each ammunition. The cycle of expenses and savings determines the promotion of the player at affordable stages.

item.title: Wordatro!
item.description: Game Description Wordatro! Combines the compilation of words with step -by -step mechanics Roguelite. The players are given a set of letters, each of which has point value, and they form expressions from them to achieve a target. The creation of words with a high cost activates the combo-abdominal, increasing points for subsequent moves. The strategic selection of lexemes and the use of symbols are of key importance for the completion of each stage.

item.title: BellFortis
item.description: Game Description In BellFortis, the action takes place in the early Middle Ages, where users seek to expand their kingdoms and influence the course of history. Title combines step -by -step strategic planning and real -time battles, which gives you the opportunity to control the army and make decisions that affect the world. Would you like to build a strong empire with the help of diplomacy or strength - the choice is yours.

item.title: Merge Maestro
item.description: Game Description Merge Maestro suggests placing an emoji chip on a mesh field. These elements are combined with others of the same type to create stronger and more high -level units. The main task is to overcome the advancing waves of opponents using these improved tokens. After each round, Gamer chooses a new element for its set, expanding tactical opportunities for future clashes. Such a cycle of placement and fusion forms a key game process that requires step -by -step solutions to clean the field and survival.

item.title: Rugby League Team Manager 4
item.description: Game Description Rugby League Team Manager 4 puts you at the head of the regional club. The circle of your tasks is covered by financial management, negotiations with sponsors and the selection of the state of assistants, mentors and medical staff. You have to improve infrastructure, including the stadium, gym and training fields. This project covers 226 teams from the Northern and Southern Hems, and over 7,000 adult players are available for choice.

item.title: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
item.description: Game Description Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown is an exciting medieval fantasy urban planning strategy that will check your leadership qualities and make you make a difficult choice to ensure the survival and prosperity of your kingdom. In this game, the fate of your people largely depends on the decisions you have taken, and the path you have chosen - favor or tyranny - will determine your heritage. The will is your weapon, you must build and strengthen your city, form the land and develop your kingdom with the help of a deep technological tree.

item.title: Loot of Baal
item.description: Game Description Loot of Baal works from the side panel of the screen, allowing you to play at the same time with other computer tasks. Players collect and send a detachment of mercenaries for battles with demons and obtaining treasures on randomly generated combat locations. The project offers hundreds of fighters, each with unique skills, and a collection of more than 1000 different things for the search. This concept of gameplay facilitates the promotion, because the key adventure occurs in a separate area of the display and does not require constant attention.

item.title: Grimstar: Crystals Are the New Oil!
item.description: Game Description Grimstar: Crystals Are the New Oil! - This is an exciting strategy in real time, in which you will go to study the distant world called Grimstar, where you will find a new type of natural energy resources. But not everything is so rosy and sunny - because of your brother’s sudden death, you have to fulfill his contract with the corporation for which he worked, and you must take his place on an alien planet.

item.title: IDLE WATERS
item.description: Game Description IDLE WATERS is a game in the IDLE-Rybank genre that works from the window at the bottom of the screen and is designed to simultaneously work with other computer operations. The game window has flexibility: it can be scale, change the layout, change the size and move to any part of the desktop or completely hide. This system allows the simulator to function without requiring constant attention from the gamer.

item.title: Covenant of Solitude
item.description: Game Description Covenant of Solitude introduces the story of a young man named Fort, who secretly owns the gift to command monsters in a secluded settlement of the leaves. The carriers of such a force are called ginns - their fate is full of persecution, fear and exploitation from others. The familiar way of life of the hero breaks off when the war breaks into his house, flooding the streets with blood and forcing the fort to accept his essence.

item.title: Rise of Industry 2
item.description: Game Description Rise of Industry 2 is a setting in which production magnates form the economy, factories produce goods at a frantic speed, and transactions are concluded according to stationary phones with a rotating dial. Success depends on smart investments, effective production and happiness of the right people. Each solution has weight, whether it is the conclusion of profitable trading transactions or the choice of the industry in which it should be dominated.

item.title: VOID War
item.description: Game Description Void War puts a player at the head of an ancient starship, sending him on a journey to the heart of a dying empire. This ship is described as a powerful and formidable gun filled with secret technologies. The tasks include the reflection of the attacks of crazy cultists, cowardly cosmopirates and xenophobic imperial soldiers. The detection of powerful artifacts allows you to turn a starship into a frightening combat vehicle.

item.title: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint
item.description: Game Description Cyber Knights: Flashpoint is an anti -utopic world in which a modern cyberpunk and a gloomy atmosphere of despair and disobey have intertwined. Since the colonization of the solar system on Earth and in other places, complete anarchy began with illegal trade and hired killers. The player will be in the very center of this new world, exploring his shadow side. Actions take place in 2223 as a result of the environmental disaster and negligence of mankind, the ozone ball was completely destroyed and people were forced to create colonies on more distant planets, the benefit of technology allow.

item.title: Neuroshima Hex
item.description: Game Description Neuroshima Hex is a post -apocalyptic tactical competition adapted from the board game system. The course of events is built on strategic solutions on the hexagonal field. Opponents use various detachments, technologies and their special skills for the implementation of military plans. Mechanics implies the arrangement of chips and determine the moment of their action. In Neuroshima Hex, players fall into the world, surviving the decline of nature, where there is a struggle for resources.

item.title: Ricave
item.description: Game Description Ricave sends a player to an escape from a changeable dungeon, where the movement occurs step by step around the cells. The battles suggest the use of the environment: you can encounter opponents in poisonous water or lure them to barrels with explosives. The state of the character monitors specific ailments, including diseases, bleeding and fractures. The damage here is local: the loss of the leg slows down, the eye injury leads to blindness, and the lack of hands limits the interaction with objects for all creatures.

item.title: Voidsayer
item.description: Game Description Voidsayer takes users to the world, captured by the abyss - all -consuming power, which leaves nothing behind. As one of the few survivors, you must accept this gloomy challenge, armed with a team of monsters. However, unlike others, you can repulse not with simple weapons, but taming and developing creatures. These are not just pets - they will become an integral part of your survival. However, there is one catch.

item.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3
item.description: Game Description fuga: Melodies of Steel 3 unfolds the story of desperate efforts. The inexplicable disappearance of Malta forces the group of children to head to the forbidden cave, where they are leaded by a mysterious voice to Taranis - a powerful armored vehicle, which was considered lost. The determination to find Malta returns them aboard this combat vehicle, starting a direct attack on the central regions of the Berman Empire.

item.title: As We Descend
item.description: Game Description AS We Descend combines Roguelike debiting with strategic gameplay. Gamers command forces in card battles against enemies in the post -apocalyptic city. The fate of mankind is determined by the tactical decisions made on the battlefield and in the political structure of the city. The project includes the creation and development of detachments using the found technologies. Each group has a special set of cards that can be expanded and modified.

item.title: ODDSPARKS: An Automation Adventure
item.description: Game Description ODDSPARKS: An Automation Adventure combines the elements of automation and real -time strategy, focusing on both veterans and beginners in the automation genre. Players explore the strange fantasy world, solve ancient secrets, build automated workshops and go to adventure with their charming sparks. The main gameplay rotates around the design and automation of workshops. Forget about conveyor ribbons - you have to control the movement of sparks in order to optimize the work of your creations.

item.title: SOL CESTO
item.description: Game Description SOL CESTO is a swift route that encounter a strategy and accident. Gamers fall into the world shrouded in secrets, and seek to get to the depths of the dungeon in search of a long -lost sun. The dungeon is generated randomly, which means that there are no two identical travels. Each floor is divided into four rooms, and you have to decide which one to enter, never knowing what awaits the door.

item.title: Zombie Cure Lab
item.description: Game Description Zombie Cure Lab - this is an opportunity to plunge into a colorful sandbox-laboratory, in which gamers have to put a variety of experiments on zombies. Scientists find a way to begin to control monsters that will be able to turn into hybrid creatures, half-dead people. Now you have to find a full medicine to calm and cure all the injured humanity from the disease of zombie. Users will build walls and fences to protect complexes with scientists.

item.title: 9 kings
item.description: Game Description 9 Kings throws users into the very heart of the medieval kingdom, where the strategy, tactics and resource management dictates the need for survival. This urban planning Roguelike combines a lot of a mechanic, offering unpredictable experience with each launch. The expansion of the kingdom requires careful planning, because the power of the empire depends on each decision. Using a deck of various cards, rulers form their possessions, adapting to unexpected challenges.

item.title: Coin Push RPG
item.description: Game Description Coin Push RPG combines the mechanics of an arcade machine with elements of pumping characters. In the center of the process is a full-fledged simulator of a classic coin-pusher, where actions directly affect resources. Good luck drums, bonus towers and jackpotes form the rhythm of sessions and provide an influx of coins. It is these coins that launch the actions of fighters subordinates to the player. In the Coin Push RPG project, characters do not enter the battle for free.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description Tinkerlands offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Survive the Fall
item.description: Game Description The disaster in Survive The Fall occurred in 2023, when a huge asteroid crashed into the ground. Most of the population died, and those who were in distant places in the world survived. The player moves to the post -apocalyptic environment, where it is necessary to engage in the construction of settlements, using tactical and strategic elements. An extensive and open world includes many good lands, forests or destroyed cities.

item.title: Cauldron
item.description: Game Description Cauldron is a role project with an emphasis on a system of improvement and the implementation of mini-stories. In the role of NIX, a character who finds himself in a world immersed in darkness will have to explore the environment and look for allies. The structure implies the cycle: the commission of actions leads to strengthening the party, which opens the way to the study of new areas and obtaining content.

item.title: Monster Battles
item.description: Game Description Monster Battles is a tactical auto-batler with equipment control. In this project, participants collect, unite and strategically place a group of creatures for upcoming fights. These creatures are purchased in a special store and then are placed on a certain battlefield before the start of an automatic fight. An effective selection and location of a variety of combat units forms the basis of the game cycle. In Monster Battles, building a successful detachment requires thoroughly accounting for the features and belonging of the collected creatures.

item.title: Blacksmith Master
item.description: Game Description Blacksmith Master is an exciting simulator in which you can control your own blacksmiths, starting with mining and precious stones to the design and sale of finished products. Your task will be tortured everything - from weapons and armor to instruments and kitchen utensils - to earn on your craft and become a real master of blacksmithing. Here you can lead your own medieval blacksmith and you will control the entire process: the extraction of resources, their processing and production and sale of finished products.

item.title: House of Legacy
item.description: Game Description House of Legacy starts at the moment when the rebels overcome the city defense, which forces the player to lead the remaining relatives in wanderings, promising many difficulties. They find a shelter in the county center, the last uninhabited corner, which is not affected by the embarrassment, where the foundations of the new dynasty are laid. This journey becomes a starting point for the formation of a weighty dynastic influence that can resist the world transformed by straightforwardness.

item.title: Ascension
item.description: Game Description Ascension invites the gamer to try on the role of a young follower, the last chance for a community that has been in a distress. Once on the other side of the portal, this character takes on the reins of government. The paramount goal is the revival of the order, honing alchemical skills and moving along the path to the highest form of being; This path is associated with the need for a competent disposal of stocks and balanced tactical moves.

item.title: Dice with Death
item.description: Game Description Dice with Death provides a script where the protagonist has already died. Instead of an immediate transition to another world, the essence known as death offers a competition. This competition forms the basis of activity presented in the Roguelike format with cube collection mechanics. The gameplay requires a direct confrontation with death in step -by -step strategic meetings. The goal lies in successful rivalry with this mythical opponent through thoughtful bones of bones.

item.title: Tower Dominion
item.description: Game Description Tower Dominion proposes to combine the construction of the landscape with the protection of the citadel from alien forces as part of Roguelike strategy. The commander (this gamer) must protect the territory from constant raids of arthronids. The gameplay implies the creation of fortifications and control over the battlefield itself during skirmishes. Each confrontation poses new tasks due to procedural generation that affects the arising difficulties. Success depends on changes in the protective orders and competent use of available funds against the advancing enemy detachments.

item.title: Yes, Your Grace 2: Snowfall
item.description: Game Description Yes, Your Grace 2: Snowfall puts players in the role of the monarch of the crumbling kingdom. They have to manage this cinematic game in the management of possessions. The key task is to find the balance between the needs of the subjects and the resources of the state. Well -being or collapse depends on the decisions made. The throne room becomes a place for a series of petitioners who bring trouble, help or entertainment in the world of Slavic folklore.

item.title: Drop Duchy
item.description: Game Description Drop Duchy combines the mechanics of geometric puzzles with the construction of the territory and the management of resources. Gamers use falling figures not only to clean the lines, but also for the phased construction of possessions. The task is to collect materials and the formation of troops to confront enemy armies, while each installed block contributes to the development of the kingdom on the path to the triumph.

item.title: Knights of the Crusades
item.description: Game Description Knights of the Crusades sends a player during the first crusades, where a lone knight will come to begin. It is ahead to go to the foundation and management of the holy order, choosing the Templars or creating their own fraction. The process combines real -time elements with the construction of settlements and management within the sandbox. You have to solve problems related to war, religious influence, diplomacy and strategic planning.

item.title: Ratopia
item.description: Game Description Ratopia is an original strategy that challenges genres thanks to a unique combination of survival, sandbox and a city construction simulator. Get ready to plunge into a huge and exciting world that will captivate you with its endless possibilities. Here you have to create your ideal city and manage it, but be careful, because every resident has its own characteristics and wealth that you must take into account. No one said that it would be easy, but with the right selection of jobs and services, you can make your residents happy, and your economy is prosperous.

item.title: Starvaders
item.description: Game Description Starvaders a combination of a mechanic of collecting a deck and step -by -step battles on the field in the setting of an alien invasion. The gamer takes control of the combat vehicle to fight the aliens with the help of compiled cards. The process moves through roguelike style visits, which requires adaptation. The task is to defend the Earth through the thoughtful use of maps and the placement of detachments on the field.

item.title: Age of Reforming: The Frelands
item.description: Game Description Age of reforging: The Frelands is a cruel world of the Middle Ages in an alternative world where magic exists, and the gods are quite real and if they are enough to pray and make generous gifts, they can even bless the asking person. There reigns tyranny and lawlessness, and survival is being built in trade. The more successful the seller, the easier he lives, the rest was terribly unlucky.

item.title: Badlands Crew
item.description: Game Description Badlands Crew transfers to the gamer control over a combat vehicle in the world of lawlessness that arose after a global catastrophe. Key tasks include the construction of transport, its modification and use against hostile groups for the search and salvation of the survivors. You collect your mobile fortress from individual components, selecting elements such as flamethrowers, sniper turrets, rate of fire machine guns, observation tower and medical points.

item.title: Survivalist: Invisible Strain
item.description: Game Description Survivalist: Invisible Strain - continuation of the game Survivalist. Events take place near Vancouver in Canada. The zombivirus epidemic has been going on for 10 years. People managed to erect settlements, well -guarded from revived dead. However, the defense of the shelters fell for unknown reasons. The survivors go to the hill, hoping to build new outposts. In the game, the survivor: an invisible strain can create your own community.

item.title: SpellroGue
item.description: Game Description SpellroGue immerses players in a world captured by corrupted hollowers. You pick up weapons, but not blades and bows, but powerful spells, fed by unpredictable mana cubes. In this step -by -step game, based on the construction of the decks, spells are pronouncing the manipulation of these cubes. The desired combination will fall out, and you will release fire balls, earthen walls or ark explosions. But the bones are unstable.

item.title: Hollywood Mogul 4
item.description: Game Description Hollywood Mogul 4 — это текстовый бизнес-симулятор, ставящий человека во главе киностудии. Система позволяет создавать кинофильмы и мини-сериалы на основе библиотеки из более чем 14 000 исходных материалов или собственных идей. Ready -made paintings can be planned for global film distribution or for distribution through streaming service. The process includes the formation of accurate budgets, the conclusion of agreements on rental in 19 foreign territories and the management of advertising expenses.

item.title: Sunderfolk
item.description: Game Description Sunderfolk is a cooperative role -playing adventure designed for joint passage on one screen. This tactical adventure is designed for a team of up to 4 people traveling together around the Sunderlands world. Title uses personal gadgets as the main interface for gamer commands and information management, instead of familiar controllers. A special program provides this connection by collecting all functions on the display of each smartphone. The company is going to overcome trials in the general virtual world.

item.title: Darkwater
item.description: Game Description Darkwater gives gamers to command a submarine, which ended up in an ice trap on a foreign planet. This is a cooperative horror, designed to work from 1 to 4 people. Survival implies navigation in a hostile environment, clashes with enemy courts and underwater life forms, as well as an active search for resources necessary for further work of submarine. Success depends on the implementation of the necessary actions for existence in underland conditions.

item.title: Escape the Mad Empire
item.description: Game Description Escape the Mad Empire is a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler, promising a mixture of tactical battles and base control. Players collect a detachment of heroes whose survival depends on strategy and resourcefulness. The combat system requires an attentive approach. Each move, each action has weight. Using the area, shelters and objects becomes the second nature, when users move around the battlefield with high rates. The Title is not amenable to simple classification, combining the elements of Roguelike, RPG and Base-Building into unique experience.

item.title: Farm Manager World
item.description: Game Description Farm Manager World puts you in the place of the world agricultural magnate. Build your farm from scratch in a variety of corners of Europe, Central America, and soon Asia. Grow a variety of exotic crops, each of which has special needs for the soil. Study and use fertilizers to improve soil quality and increase productivity. Use crop rotation to achieve optimal results. Grow livestock from birth or buy it directly.

item.title: It
item.description: Game Description IT’s on the Mouse combines a cafe management with a 3D platformer, providing players with control over the main characters of Holly. Being a tiny maid, she is forced to use a special navigation method in the working environment due to her growth. The gamer has to jump and run around the tables and racks to get to customers and submit orders to them. This movement system is central mechanics for receiving applications and delivery of the desired dishes.

item.title: Synergy
item.description: Game Description synergy dedicated to survival on a hostile planet. In this urban planning strategy, players have to develop their city, face natural cataclysms and make the right decisions that will certainly have consequences. Explore this constantly changing world, preserving the happiness of the townspeople in extreme weather conditions. Gamers will control the weather, seasons, extreme conditions and natural disasters. The main goal is to build a city where residents will be happy and satisfied, respecting the natural needs of the inhabitants and living in harmony with the local fauna and flora.

item.title: Milord
item.description: Game Description Milord is a role -playing game about the management of medieval ownership, combined with elements of urban development. You take under direct control of the Earth, where your specific instructions determine the fate of the inhabitants and general prosperity. Preservation of reserves is a constant factor affecting all aspects of management and requiring careful planning. Through a petition system, subjects directly turn to the ruler for help, intervention or solving various local issues.

item.title: Hollywood Animal
item.description: Game Description Hollywood Animal is not an ordinary strategic game. Forget about the conquest of empires or the construction of huge cities. Here you are in the roaring twenties - the time when the silent movie gave way to the “talkers”, and the film studios tried to keep up. You are in the director’s chair, but not for the camera. This time you are a studio boss, solving all issues, starting from who will play in the film, and ending when the last blockbuster is released.

item.title: Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days
item.description: Game Description Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days transfer the player to Walton City, Texas, 1980 sample, covered by a zombie epidemic. The gamer has to lead a detachment of surviving through the dying metropolis. The key task of the gameplay is to move the wards between temporary shelters, taking care of their condition. It is necessary to find provisions, make objects and repulse constant danger from the dead who filled the streets.

item.title: Burden of Command
item.description: Game Description Burden of Command gives players a completely different idea of what projects can be in the theme of World War II. The local scale is considered here, and the focus is a small group of fighters. The gamer is given the opportunity to become the commander of this group, making important decisions in key situations. The guys have to visit hot spots around the world, from Western Europe and ending with Morocco, where the remnants of enemy forces were still based at that moment.

item.title: Commandos: Origins
item.description: Game Description Commandos: Origins depicts the origin of a specialized military group of the Second World War. This part of the series returns gamers to the origins of tactics in real time. The narrative covers the period when Jack O’Hara, Green Beres, met his five comrades, forming a detachment, which was entrusted with tasks that were considered too dangerous for ordinary forces. Players have to lead this detachment in the Title Commandos: Origins, coordinating the actions of the green beret, sapper, sniper, driver, marine and spy.

item.title: Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers
item.description: Game Description Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers calls the gamarines into a world filled with more than 180 creatures who need to collect, fight and develop. The Title combines the elements of autoboeviks, rogeliks and card battles, allowing users to develop unique strategies. The purpose of the game is to assemble the KDOMON team, each of which has various abilities and types in order to pass more and more difficult tests. As you pass, you will encounter powerful bosses and open rare monsters with special abilities.

item.title: Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder
item.description: Game Description Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder can be attributed to the simulators of the colony and real -time strategies. There are also survival elements in the indie project. He has high reigree due to the random generation of cards. The gamer here is offered to establish a settlement and help it develop to a full -fledged city. At the same time, it is necessary to monitor the needs and mood of the townspeople.

item.title: Pocket City 2
item.description: Game Description Pocket City 2 makes it possible for players to build cities, and then study their first -person creations. The process starts from the laying of roads, the markings of sections for residential, commercial or industrial needs and the construction of the necessary objects on the map. Control over the economy implies monitoring of stocks, profit and a thoughtful placement of special structures, access to which opens as they move.

item.title: Kaiserpunk
item.description: Game Description Kaiserpunk throws you headlong into an alternative XX century, instructing to build an empire from scratch. This is not Grandfather’s Urban planner - Title offers a grandiose strategy, demanding from you to win a vast card, while preserving the residents happy, and the factory - working. Does it sound like a high task? This is true. Forget that you can just put at home and finish it on this.

item.title: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a survival simulator that immerses in the very heart of the ancient forest. Title takes users to a world where nature is not only living, but also has its own mind. Here, gamers build a house, overcome daily difficulties and interact with a rich ecosystem full of wild animals, magical creatures and unpredictable forces. Every day brings new difficulties associated with survival: from hunger and health management to solving problems with the weather and seasons.

item.title: FACEMINER
item.description: Game Description FaceMiner offers a deep immersion in the world of collecting biometric data. Here gamers fall into the chaotic world before the beginning of the new millennium, where the main task is to collect and classifying data on faces on a mass scale. As a user, you start small, gradually building an empire from biometric data. On this path, you have to expand the scale: to update software, develop infrastructure and maximize profits, overcoming the sea of ​​corporate problems.

item.title: Die in the dungeon
item.description: Game Description Die in the Dungeon throws another set of cubes in the Roguelike genre. Forget about the meticulously compiled deck of cards. Instead, you collect your arsenal from a set of cubes, each of which indicates the action: attack enemies, treat wounds or control yourself a throw of fate. Each meeting becomes a gambling game, an exciting test of luck, where one throw can turn the course of the battle.

item.title: Dead Dragons
item.description: Game Description Dead Dragons launches history 100 years after the victory of people over the dragons - the events that allegedly brought the world. Now rumors about the return of these creatures encourage the protagonist to investigate the case of a mysterious girl associated with the dragon race. This task develops into a conflict that decides the fate of the whole world and raises the main question of the survival of one of the species in the upcoming confrontation.

item.title: Dawnfolk
item.description: Game Description In Dawnfolk, the action of which takes place in a world covered by darkness. As a ruler of the kingdom lost to the shadows, you must restore and protect your people. With the help of a mystical creature, Luer, you must navigate in the darkness and work on the restoration of light on Earth. In the center - research, resource management and decision -making when you restore your kingdom from scratch.

item.title: Astronomics
item.description: Game Description In Astronomics, gamers are sent to study the space and the production of asteroids. You have to move through randomly generated asteroids, extract resources and manage a developing enterprise. At first, the whole thing is assembling materials on asteroids flying past, but as it moves forward, automation becomes a key factor. With workers and command bots, at your disposal, the tasks for which the clock used to go, can be completed much faster.

item.title: Novus orbis
item.description: Game Description Novus orbis is a Roguelike designer of decks, inviting gamers to the world, where selected cards and how you play them determine your path. The essence is to master the combo. Each card has its value, and their effect depends on how you arrange them - play the cards in the correct order to maximize their strength, or mix them to get a potentially different result. This emphasis on the strategy gives Tita depth, forcing you to be on the alert while you are guided in complex mechanics.

item.title: Last outpost
item.description: Game Description Last Outpost is a strategy with elements of basic construction, the action of which takes place in the post -apocalyptic world, teeming with zombies. Gamers have to build and strengthen their outpost in order to survive in chaos conditions. As the days stretch, the threat poses not only the undead - the other survivors, the same desperate, will try to capture what you built. Resource management, modernization of defensive structures and ensuring the safety of outpost require constant attention.

item.title: Stray Path
item.description: Game Description Stray Path combines Freecell mechanics and strategic adventure gameplay. Gamers begin with the choice of one of several characters and plunge into the world, which is different each time. The Title offers a random set of enemies, tests and awards, all this is regulated by the cards that you pull. Each card is a new decision, whether it is a battle, avoiding a meeting or choosing equipment. The choice you make affects the outcome of your trip.

item.title: Blood Bar Tycoon
item.description: Game Description In Blood Bar Tycoon, users are in the place of the manager of the Vampire Bar. The goal is to create and manage a series of blood bars so that people and vampire customers are satisfied. Along the way, gamers build blood factories, collect blood and encounter problems such as hunters and vampire-competing. Due to the possibility of micro -study or assignment automation, users can accurately configure the work to develop their dark empire.

item.title: Foundation
item.description: Game Description The urban planning simulator-Foundation-will allow you to plunge in the medieval era, build a whole settlement, make people happy at the expense of unique structures, as well as understand the history of the construction of houses and churches, on which there was a lot of emphasis due to constant rivalry of religious directions. We will build houses and other structures with smart brushes. They will allow us not to exceed authority and put only those buildings that will meet environmental norms and criteria.

item.title: Heart of the Machine
item.description: Game Description Heart of the Machine outwardly resembles a town -planning Taikun. But in fact, the project is something like a god of God with elements of tactics and strategy in real time. Only here the Juzer is assigned the role of not a divine being, which owns magic, but artificial intelligence. This video game has a science fiction setting. Its action takes place in a distant and gloomy future in the territory of the metropolis-colonies.

item.title: Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap
item.description: Game Description Orcs Must Die! Deathtrap is a third -person action player and trap protection, which used the main elements of its predecessors and added several new opportunities designed to diversify the gameplay. The action takes place in the same universe as in the previous parts of Orcs Must Die!, And gamers will have to join chaotic battles with the waves of orcs and other monstrous creatures, using all kinds of weapons, traps and strategic solutions.

item.title: Space Engineers 2
item.description: Game Description Space Engineers 2 returns to the world of space development with updated experience. In this continuation, you will have a new adventure in the Almagest system, where engineering tasks and spaces of space are combined in the most unexpected way. This is a sandbox with an open world in which you can build from scratch - or, rather, from stars - from starships to entire space stations. The goal is simple: to raise your creative potential to a new height, while managing the difficulties of survival in the cold, inexorable spaces of space.

item.title: Learning Factory
item.description: Game Description learning factory - a simulator that is designed to create an automated process of processes and, most importantly, understand one simple truth: what do cats want? The gameplay allows you to head the Kotovod factory. It was once closed, but now it has been possible to renew the process and create your own cat store. Learning factory gameplay largely gives an idea of ​​how machine learning works. Your factory is analyzing a huge database, trying to study the behavior of pets.

item.title: Those Who Rule
item.description: Game Description In Those Who Rule, users find themselves in the place of recruits who fell into a whirlwind of deception and war. Title begins with the team of characters that should be guided in a complex world where decisions have weight, and unions change from the wind. Users gain allies, each of which has special abilities and personal history, and spend them through more and more complex battles. The main goal is to reveal the true forces standing behind the current conflict, while trying to be one step ahead of enemies and changing loyalty.

item.title: IDUN
item.description: Game Description Idun throws you into a hostile world, teeming with resources and teeming with enemies. This is a genre mixing in which in real time the strategy is combined with the protection of the tower, which gives a unique experience. Your mission? To capture all the most valuable and get out alive. But this is not a light walk. Enemy hordes are teeming on the battlefield, tirelessly pursuing your base.

item.title: Harvest Hills
