item.description: Game Description Harvest Hills immerses the player in plant cultivation and animal care in order to obtain agricultural products. The initial actions allow you to create products such as eggs, milk, honey and wool. The sale of these products in the local market provides income to modernize the economy and introduce automation systems. According to the plot, the protagonist leaves the city bustle for the founding of an agrarian enterprise, gradually turning the empty plot of land into a flourishing ranch.

item.title: Builders of Egypt
item.description: Game Description Builders of Egypt is a urban planning simulator in which the player acts as a manager of a great country located in the Nile River Valley. The huge rate is made on the economic development of the state, for this a large number of mechanics have been added, complicating the process of state development. The gamer will see the history of the origin of the Egyptian state in the proto -the -stage period, the golden age, ending with the death of Cleopatra Seventh.

item.title: Deathless. Tales of Old Rus
item.description: Game Description Deathless. Tales of Old Rus immerses gamers in a role -playing game with a deck created against the backdrop of Slavic myths and legends. Explore the vivid world of the Belosweres along with the legendary heroes and terrible creatures from children’s fairy tales at night. Currently, you can take on the role of brave barbarian beautiful, and soon wise Vasilisa will join you. Together you will withstand the growing bestiaria from more than 40 monsters and 8 bosses.

item.title: Defensurvivor
item.description: Game Description Defensurvivor puts a player at the head of the protection of asylum in the world captured by zombies. The main goal is to hold out for 15 minutes against the continuous waves of attackers, managing defense and staff. Gamers erect and modernize the walls through the construction menu, creating barriers to the direction of movement of the approaching horde. Success requires adaptation to the fighters accidentally issued for each session.

item.title: Fernageddon
item.description: Game Description Fernageddon begins the global burning campaign, during which the player acts as a champion of the great god of fire. The main task is to incinerate the world in accordance with the will of the deity about complete destruction. A novice novice goes on this journey, accumulating skills, studying spells and finding followers to help in total annihilation. Successful conquests bring the favor of a capricious idol, opening access to increasing power and legendary weapons.

item.title: Caves of QUD
item.description: Game Description Caves of QUD-A game in the sling genre with an unusual mixture of styles, such as: fantasy (ordinary swords and bows as a weapon of murders, are combined with magic and marvelous creatures), post-apocalypse and science fiction. A feature will be the choice of a protagonist before the start of each new preservation with his bonuses. The mutant receives unlimited scope for various modifications, by obtaining changes in his DNA, in other words, mutations, among which there is a second heart, second head, wings, claws and much more.

item.title: Space Architect
item.description: Game Description Space Architect is a simulator where gamers have to become in place of the manager of the space station. The main goal is to build, maintain and expand the space station, simultaneously coping with the difficulties of resource management and interstellar trade. In the beginning, users are faced with a serious financial burden - a huge debt to a powerful megarporace, which forces them to make complex decisions on how to get income and stay afloat in endless cosmic voids.

item.title: Industry Giant 4.0
item.description: Game Description Industry Giant 4.0 immerses gamers in the landscape determined by industrial management and strategy. Since the 1950s, users are moving through the fourth industrial revolution, where digitalization and interconnected chains of creating cost play the most important role. The goal is to create and manage the industrial empire. This includes not only the production of goods, but also the creation of complex transport networks and monitoring financial transactions.

item.title: Zephon
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Zephon have to take control of the remnants of mankind in order to survive on the territory of the Earth. On the planet, there are few areas that are not suitable for life, and most of the cities were destroyed. In wild territories are mutating creatures that they gather in small groups and begin to hunt for surviving people. Alien robots with damaged systems roam on the surface, and the aliens themselves are hidden and try to secure survival.

item.title: One Socket
item.description: Game Description One Socket puts the player before the need to charge the generator to power vital devices, which is complicated by the presence of only one working outlet. This critical restriction makes us make constant strategic decisions about which equipment to use, while the monster is hiding in the surrounding darkness. To get out of imprisonment, you need to dispose of meager resources, solve the secrets of the location and survive a constant threat.

item.title: Elin
item.description: Game Description Elin is a two -dimensional role morned in which you can completely immerse yourself in an exciting world, where each solution matters. Choose your hero and go on a dangerous trip to Ylva’s lands, exploring mysterious places, meeting unique characters and fighting various dangers. You will find unforgettable adventures, where you will create your own story, influence the world and leave your mark on Ylva Earth. You have to fight for survival, find and create resources, build houses and manage your city.

item.title: Widget Inc.
item.description: Game Description Widget Inc. - This is a hybrid of the designer of factories and an incremental clicker, who invites users to the kingdom of crafts and production. Starting with basic resources, people go on a trip to master various craft processes. Target? Build a huge factory capable of producing advanced technologies, known as widgets. These widgets serve as a key element of the revival of civilization after the apocalypse. Users perform many tasks, each of which helps to build an empire extending to the stars.

item.title: The Dead Await
item.description: Game Description The Dead Await immerses users in gloomy adventures, where it is necessary to survive during the zombie apocalypse. The users will have to participate in cruel step-by-step battles with walking dead, gradually gathering their own deck with cards-abilities. It will be possible to configure and pump the characters in the detachment, engage in the study of the open world, to extract resources, trade with secondary NPS and manage its own caravan for survival.

item.title: Citadelum
item.description: Game Description Citadelum throws its hat to the ring of strategic games, offering the experience of building cities with an admixture of mythology and strategic conquests. Ancient Rome serves as a background for the game: gamers take control of a nascent settlement and should turn it into a lively metropolis. Resource management is a paramount task for any novice urban planner. But Citadelum is not only overgrown suburbs and towering monuments.

item.title: Eden Crafters
item.description: Game Description Eden Crafters throws glove in the hands of survival and automation lovers. In this cooperative adventure with the open world, players will turn to turn a hostile planet into a hospitable refuge for humanity. Think about this as a space project of reconstruction - harsh conditions, fluids of the house of dreams. Task? Overcome the unpleasant habits of the planet and build a new house for humanity. Imagine radioactive zones and insidious landscapes are not the best real estate.

item.title: Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator
item.description: Game Description Heavy Cargo - The Truck Simulator is an opportunity to feel like a real trucker who is forced to transport goods through the huge open world. It is necessary to search for orders, loading, unloading and accompanying a variety of cars in convoys. It will be possible to test several types of trailers that can transport the tractor. Juzerov is waiting for the gameplay of the classic driver’s simulator, which controls a big truck.

item.title: Liar's bar
item.description: Game Description Liar’s Bar is a multi -user online game, whose action takes place in a bar, where deception and strategy play a key role. Users are united at tables of four people to take part in games such as Liar’s Dice and Liar’s Deck. The goal is to outwit rivals using bliff and strategic moves. Each session is filled with stress, as gamers are trying to unravel each other’s intentions and make the right moves to win.

item.title: Ultimate Zombie Defense 2
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Zombie Defense 2 throws you headlong into the tireless struggle for survival. Strengthen your positions against the wave waves with the help of a reliable base construction system. Classes from chains, sandbags and concrete barriers - it is time to show ingenuity and build an impenetrable fortress. But defense is only one side of the coin. The main thing here is the strategy. To restrain the inexorable hordes, you will have to cunningly arrange turrets, mines and even fog lights.

item.title: Rats in a Cage
item.description: Game Description Rats in a Cage proposes to solve puzzles in the form of a corporate certification. The player will manipulate colleagues, strategically placing coffee or spreading gossip, changing their routes and assigning other people’s merits to himself. The whole process oversees artificial intelligence, actively interfering with passage and sometimes interacting with elements outside the game window. Such a gameplay constantly experiences the willingness to sacrifice others for the sake of personal benefits and career growth.

item.title: Endzone 2
item.description: Game Description Endzone 2 throws you into the thick of the post -apocalyptic world. Humanity died, and you remained to collect fragments - literally. Each decision that you make as if you can send your scattered colony by the line. Lack of resources? Eat. Danger to the environment? Do not hesitate. Ruthless raiders eager to steal your lunch? Undoubtedly. This is not a simple walk. This is the management of your nascent civilization.

item.title: Toy Shire
item.description: Game Description Toy Shire revives a children’s room in a strategic battle. Bluespy Studios came up with this curious name by putting the player in the role of a defender. No pistols or grenades. Instead, plastic warriors and cardboard fortresses dominate the battlefield. The territory of the child is becoming a zone of hostilities. Tables, corners and floor of the bedroom turn into strategic landscapes. Gamers erect toy towers, these bizarre structures built from childhood residues.

item.title: Terminus: Zombie Survivors
item.description: Game Description Terminus: Zombie Survivors is a gloomy journey that takes gamers to the setting of the zombie apocalypse. It is ahead to survive among dangerous mutants, making their way through a variety of locations. The main task for the hero will be the search for the place of terminus, the last stronghold of mankind. In the game there are elements of Rowlaik that create random situations on the map. It will come out to compete with starvation, cold temperature and aggressive opponents.

item.title: Intravenous 2
item.description: Game Description Intravenous 2 immerses you in the world of cruel intrigues and intense action. Play for Sean, desperately trying to save his abducted father, and Steve, a grumbling former military with a dark past. Their unlikely union is based on a common goal: to pass the labyrinth of the underworld, complete secrets, lies and mortal danger. But how you can handle this insidious Odyssey depends only on you. Will you be a ghost, fluttering in shadows and manipulating environment in your interests?

item.title: ODD Realm
item.description: Game Description ODD Realm is a game that combines both the strategy and the survival simulator. The player will have to take on the role of the leader of a small settlement and provide residents with the necessary resources, houses, as well as protect their subjects from bloodthirsty enemies and dishonest bandits from a high road. The variability of the development of the plot provides the gamer with wide opportunities for the construction of the city of his own dreams.

item.title: Sins of A Solar Empire 2
item.description: Game Description Sins of A Solar Empire 2 is a space strategy in which players have to take one of three races under their control in order to fight for dominance over the whole galaxy. It will be necessary to engage in the study of space, expand the sphere of influence, extract resources and fight with representatives of the warring faction. The game presents a lot of diverse mechanics, including military operations, diplomacy, trade, etc.

item.title: Depersonalization
item.description: Game Description Depersonalization may interest amateurs of anime, Howard Lovecraft and Tactical Japanese Role Games. This is a mixture of TRPG, horror and visual novel. When creating their project, Chinese developers were inspired by the world of space horrors created by an eminent writer. Their creation boasts a detailed and designed pixel 2D graphic in anime style. The project is divided into several modules. Each of them has various finals and branches.

item.title: Dungeons & Degenerate Gamblers
item.description: Game Description Dungeons & Degenerate Gamblers throws a crooked ball into traditional card games. Forget about the ink, peaks and trefches. Here the king is a blackjack, but with a highlight - a Roguelike -inventor, that is. Imagine yourself in a dull lighted tavern, smoke falls from your tube while you evaluate your opponent at a shabby table. But instead of swords and witchcraft, your weapons are cards. Unique cards that can improve your hand, ruin the enemy’s deck or even affect the course of history.

item.title: Norland
item.description: Game Description Medieval setting in** Norland** shows interactive stories that will happen to the royal family. Players will manage the birth that controls the city. We will have to observe the activities of ordinary workers, peasants, slaves, soldiers and criminals. Each character has needs, as well as a unique character. Users will have to distribute instructions for family members in order to put order in the urban district. We will have to take power into your own hands, dealing with different economic or military spheres.

item.title: Strategic Command Wwii: War in the Pacific
item.description: Game Description Strategic Command Wwii: War in the Pacific, heads you into the chaos of the Pacific Theater during the Second World War. This step -by -step strategic game boasts a huge map of 36,000 hexes, allowing you to develop a strategy in a vast territory - from the jungle of Burma to the shores of California. Fasten the belts, because on December 7, 1941 you will encounter a full-scale Japanese offensive, which will pass throughout Southeast Asia and the Pacific Ocean.

item.title: Terrascape
item.description: Game Description Terrascape allows gamers to fulfill their dream - build their own city! Thanks to the wide selection of decks, offering unique buildings and the possibilities of expansion, you can strategically place your cards on the game field to earn points and open new awards. You will need to carefully consider the influence of each building on your city, including its influence on other buildings, natural resources and terrain. Collect positive factors of influence to get bonus glasses, but beware of negative factors that may interfere with your progress.

item.title: The Crust
item.description: Game Description The Crust is a survival with elements of the economy, where the player will build a whole small town with highly limited resources almost without the possibility of replenishing them. In order to grow at least something on such a surface and provide your people with the proper amount of food, you will have to try hard. However, with proper management, this is still quite possible. The main character is the head of the space company, which was decided by the first to colonize the moon.

item.title: The Dungeon-Dungeon AWAITS
item.description: Game Description The Dungeon-Dungeon AWAITS is a step-by-step game where survival depends on spatial thinking. Each enemy and type of weapons act according to a unique scheme on the battlefield, forming a tactical environment from intersecting zones of defeat. Success is maneuvering for the operation of enemy vulnerability, while trying to cover the maximum area with his own arsenal. Any movement, the use of an object or attack completes the move, giving opponents the opportunity to deliver a response.

item.title: Dystopika
item.description: Game Description Dystopika is not an ordinary Advent. This is a digital sandbox, a neon platform for builders without drawings. Forget about resource management, population growth or economic balance. These things do not exist here. Instead, you are a digital architect, free to create a metropolis from scratch. No grandiose plans, no ultimate goal. This is a trip, not a destination. You build buildings, observe their growth and allow the city to develop organically.

item.title: Field of Glory: Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Field of Glory: Kingdoms is an unusual strategy that allows you to lead various nations and create formidable kingdoms from them, which makes it one of the most exciting games in the genre. The action takes place in 1054, shortly after the great split, and immerses players in the more than two -century history of Europe, Africa and the Middle East. The project has a stunning set of capabilities: 375 fractions, 325 detachments, 600 buildings, 14 religions and 90 cultural characteristics, all of which are new for this publication.

item.title: Thriving City: Song
item.description: Game Description Thriving City: Song offers to be transferred to the past, in 960 of our era, and take on the role of the mayor in the recently formed Zhao Song dynasty. This gaming -symbol of the city’s construction in ancient China is a rich historical adventure with elements of strategy and plot. Your task as a mayor is to help the townspeople settle down, cultivate the land and expand the city.

item.title: Reus 2
item.description: Game Description Reus 2 stands out with its uniqueness and fascination. In this game, you have the power of the gods, controlling powerful giants that form the world for the prosperity or death of human civilizations. From the very beginning, everything is extremely clear: in Reus 2 you have to decide the fate of mankind, making your choice and committing actions. You will get the opportunity to choose giants for yourself, each of which has its own abilities and characteristics.

item.title: Isles of Sea and Sky
item.description: Game Description Isles of Sea and Sky - a strategic adventure with a huge number of puzzles for logic, attentiveness and ingenuity. The project, developed by two programmers, uses pixel graphics and a camera located on top, which refers to some classic games with a similar theme and visual side. There is support for gamepads without additional configuration. The casual management will make life easier for beginners, but the complex tasks posed to the user will gradually become increasingly confusing and incomprehensible at first glance.

item.title: Rogue Voltage
item.description: Game Description Rogue Voltage immerses you in the world of crazy science and monstrous chaos. This indie game combines Roguelike elements and automation mechanics, in which you have to create your own combat abilities. Forget about pressing the buttons - the strategy dominates here. Each move you have to manage resources. To release a powerful explosion, heal yourself with a potion or accumulate energy for the future offensive? The choice is yours, and each solution can persuade the scales in the battle.

item.title: Nordic ashes: Survivors of Ragnarok
item.description: Game Description Nordic ashes: survivors of ragnarok - Dynamic adventure with elements of action and simplified cuckle. The plot is inspired by Scandinavian legends and motives. The main character finds himself in a dangerous environment in which he will face hordes of enemy and deadly creatures. He needs to stay alive among hundreds of opponents and traps, gradually pumping his abilities and finding more powerful equipment. The central character will move between worlds, fight with powerful bosses, overcome traps and find objects of equipment.

item.title: Headquarters: World War II
item.description: Game Description Headquarters: World War 2, a fascinating step -by -step strategy, immerses users into an exciting battle for Normandy through three campaigns and numerous skirmishes. This project allows gamers to accept command on both sides of the conflict, heading the United States, Great Britain or Germany. The combat system is simultaneously accessible and complex, providing players with many strategic capabilities. In this dynamic game, combat units have anterior, side, rear and upper armor, which makes their location on the battlefield by a decisive factor.

item.title: From Glory to Goo
item.description: Game Description From Glory to Goo is a cosmic adventure. Forget about the conquest of the new worlds - here the survival depends on how to cling to the fragment of the rock among the inexorable stream of mucus. You play for the captain, the last hope of mankind, who is instructed to establish a fragile colony on a hostile foreign world. Your enemies are not rival empires and not robots with lasers, but the ubiquitous mucus, a reasonable, changing form, the threat that oozes, drips and crawls to your colony from all sides.

item.title: Mortal Glory 2
item.description: Game Description Mortal Glory 2 is a fantasy RPG in the Roguelike genre, which combines a step -by -step tactical battle and team management. It is proposed to be in the role of the leader of the team of wandering gladiators, and your ultimate goal is to take part in the tournament, the victory in which guarantees glory and wealth. One of the main features of the game is the variety of available races, each of which has its own unique advantages and disadvantages.

item.title: Primitive Society Simulator
item.description: Game Description Primitive Society Simulator will transfer you to the inexorable cradle of civilization. In the role of the leader of the ancient tribe, you will lead your people through the torment of the prehistoric period, controlling the subtle dance between survival and progress. Guided by Chinese legends, Primitive Society Simulator echoes Rimworld and Dawn of Man. You will move to those days when every sunrise was like victory, and every hunt is the risk of extinction.

item.title: Craftomation 101: Programming and Craft
item.description: Game Description CraftMATION 101: Programming and Craft offers to gamers to be on an unknown planet, in the company of the right robot and many mechanisms that will help you make it viable. You will find endless opportunities for the extraction and combination of resources, programming robots, creating tools and terraforming the planet. You can create your own army of robots that will work for you, collect resources, perform tasks and even create new robots.

item.title: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks
item.description: Game Description ARMS TRADE TYCOON: Tanks is a full -fledged simulation of the life of a magnate, managing the beginner company in trade and distribution of weapons. The company specializes in the creation and sale of tanks, on the technical characteristics of which the user will work. The game allows you to create unique engineering solutions by exploring new technologies and production methods. It is necessary to engage in the formation of the history of tank wars, where the created cars will be involved.

item.title: Hellcard
item.description: Game Description Hellcard is made in the same style as the original book of demons. Their universe is also common. The first game was a simplified diabloid and narrated about the fight against evil awakened in the catacombs under the city. The spin-off changed the genre, turning from Hack and Slash into a step-by-step card RPG. One of the chips in the form of cardboard graphics has not gone away. The elements of the sideline remained.

item.title: Rising Lords
item.description: Game Description Rising Lords presents a mixture of a strategy with a card game in medieval setting. Fights are implemented using step -by -step mechanics. The player collects slaves and uses them for his personal purposes. As in any economic strategy, the gameplay is based on the collection of resources and taxes. The player is free to set the amount of duties depending on the solvency of units. It is required to set tasks and work to the peasants for the whole day.

item.title: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout
item.description: Game Description Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout - an adventure action in which a group of people falls on a tropical island equipped with high -tech objects. The territory is governed by AI, which produces a huge number of combat robots and artificially nurtures of dinosaurs. The game is made in the Cyberpanus setting and contains elements of metroid. Once on the island, it must be examined by opening the results of a monstrous experiment.

item.title: World Warfare and Economics
item.description: Game Description World Warfare and Economics is a fascinating and large -scale strategy that offers to take control of any country on Earth, finding himself at the helm of world history. Having the opportunity to manage politics, economics and the armed forces of the country, players go through many trials, including the impending ghost of the Third World War, the inexorable procession of global pandemia and even scenarios created at their own discretion.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is an isometric role -playing game made based on the cult universe of a fighting hammer. In her setting, the Grimard is mixed with science fiction. This product offers to travel through space on a huge ship, visit different places, chat with colorful non -pains, pump, perform quests, participate in battles. All the battles here are step -by -step and tactical. They are divided into 2 types.

item.title: Ticket to Ride
item.description: Game Description Ticket to Ride is a digital adaptation of a popular board game that invites gamers to go to a global railway adventure. Here, participants will have to build the most branched railway network, connecting the cities and completing the routes. Users play the cards to capture sections of the railway, building a strategy to go around rivals and achieve their goals. Title has both a single -user and multi -user regimes, which allows you to diversify the gameplay.

item.title: Dungeons 4
item.description: Game Description Dungeons 4 is a real -time fantasy strategy with a bias in urban development, in which gamers will take the side of darkness and help the absolute evil and his faithful waist of the waist to win over the forces of good. You will fall into a fascinating world where peace and harmony once reigned, but now other times have come. You have to build your dungeon and direct your creatures into the outside world in order to envelop it with darkness and bring victory to the absolute evil.

item.title: Lost Hope: Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Lost Hope: BackRooms offers a single first -person adventure in the alarming locations of backstage. Key classes include navigation for these confusing, interconnected places and active interaction with the environment for solving logical puzzles, which contributes to the development of the main plot. The area often demonstrates strange and inexplicable phenomena, which are difficult to immediately comprehend. Gamers have to carefully study these elements in order to reveal the secrets hidden in this tense journey.

item.title: Back to the Dawn
item.description: Game Description The prison atmosphere in Back to the Dawn shows the life of an anthropomorphic animal that is forced to fight for the right to exist in a zone. Gamers will explore prison laws, rules and locations in which a protagonist finds himself. The main character will pump and make new acquaintances, relying on his own social skills. It will be possible to use cunning and intelligence to solve many problems, where the main task is an attempt to escape from imprisonment.

item.title: For the king 2
item.description: Game Description For The King 2 is a continuation of an unforgettable adventure RPG with elements of the board game and Roguelike, where you can defeat the formidable queen alone or together with three comrades. You have to explore the world and increase your level in order to reveal the secrets of the past and overthrow the despotistical queen. Try to avoid the queen fanatical guards who control everything around, and combine their forces with their apostates to conquer this world.

item.title: CITIES: SkyLines 2
item.description: Game Description CITIES: Skylines II, which allows you to truly prove yourself as an urban plan and mayor, allows you to get an incomparable experience in urban planning. This is a world where your creative abilities and the ability to solve problems are subjected to a fierce test, and there are no limits to what you can achieve. The game begins with the creation of the main elements of the city - roads, infrastructure and systems that ensure its life.

item.title: Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova
item.description: Game Description Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova is a fascinating global strategy in science fiction setting. You are the leader of the cosmic civilization, which is ready to conquer the universe. You have many abilities to achieve this goal: from conquering planets to creating cultural domination and political alliances. You have to explore the galaxy, colonize new worlds and manage your home planet. You will be engaged in trade, diplomacy, intrigue and war with other aliens.

item.title: Railgrade
item.description: Game Description Railgrade gameplay combines elements of strategy and construction. The plot covers the times of the great construction of railways around the world in order to connect fast transportation between foreign cities with valuable industry. The main character will save the future of mankind, since he is the last employee of the earth colony. Megacorporations asked him to fulfill a difficult mission and save everything that remained on the planet after the disaster that occurred due to errors in the calculations of management.

item.title: Dotage
item.description: Game Description Dotage offers a unique game experience. Michele was feasted and others developed the concept of this digital kingdom. Players move around the world devoid of clear goals. The gameplay rotates around simple mechanics: pressing one button moves the protagonist forward. This seemingly simple action becomes the basis for a trip, rich in interpretation. The visual language of the game consists of abstract landscapes and mysterious symbols. The narrative unfolds through these elements, inviting to introspection, and not giving obvious explanations.

item.title: AFTERWAR
item.description: Game Description AFTERWAR represents a global scenario unfolding in 2028, after a centuries of conflicts. The alternative version of the future left behind historical wars, laying the foundation for universal interaction. In the role of the national leader, the player will have to unite the states and dispose of resources to build a new society. Any step, from the distribution of the budget and the introduction of advanced technologies to the conclusion of international agreements, directly affects the balance between stability and chaos.

item.title: Rise of the White Sun
item.description: Game Description Rise of the White Sun transfers to the chaos of China of the 1920s, the period of riots and fragmented leadership. In this grandiose strategic game, you have to pave the way through a fragmented nation controlled by military leaders, rebels and political groups. The action unfolds at a time when various groups dispute control of vast territories and armies, each of which has its own goals, objectives and motives.

item.title: High Sea Saga DX
item.description: Game Description High Sea Saga DX immerses players in the marine environment, focused on the accumulation of wealth and global research. In this Title, gamers control the pirate team crossing the oceans in search of hidden treasures scattered through a variety of geographical zones. Each such journey entails a clash with various wild creatures and battles with warring pirate fractions that pursue similar goals. Success requires the collection of an effective detachment and the construction of a swimming agent, ready for long -term crossings by open waters.

item.title: Bee Island
item.description: Game Description In Bee Island, you will become the head of a prosperous hive, taking on the role of a defender from impending threats. The main attention in the game is paid to defense and strategic construction. Enemies make sporadic attacks, and your task is to protect the hive. They are armed with bombs, poisonous aerosols and missiles, their strength is constantly growing. To reflect their attack, you have to build a whole complex of protective structures - ballists, machine guns, anti -aircraft missile systems and much more.

item.title: Golf it!
item.description: Game Description The simulator of a real golf - Golf it! - It is a sports, but ridiculous brainchild of the studio of developers who want to turn American sport into a kind of fantastic game. The player’s career begins with simple levels, where to calculate the trajectory and the impact of the impact is easier, but gradually we will approach the complex levels at which even pushing the ball will be difficult.

item.title: Desynced
item.description: Game Description Desynced is a three -dimensional real -time strategy. The indie project also has elements of survival and a colony control simulator. The Title is made in a science fiction setting. It has support for user modifications. According to the plot, the hero travels along with artificial intelligence and colonizers between distant planets. The protagonist plants bots to the surface, and he remains in orbit and leads mechanical creatures from there.

item.title: Railway Empire 2
item.description: Game Description Railway Empire 2 is a transport strategy that offers to go into the past, at the beginning of the 19th century, and lead a small railway company, which will become the leader of the economy thanks to steam cars. Here you have to compete with competitors and build a network of railways, which will connect cities and companies throughout the continent. At your disposal 60 famous steam machines that pull freight and passenger cars, opening the historically significant era of the time of the industrial revolution.

item.title: Fly Corp
item.description: Game Description The development of routes in Fly Corp allows you to feel the work of real airports located throughout the globe. Players get the opportunity to create transport routes in the airspace, setting up the uninterrupted transportation of passengers who want to fly from one city to another. The task of the user will be to establish the right nodes and the implementation of flights that can most profitably and effectively transport the inhabitants of the planet to the necessary destination.

item.title: Silica
item.description: Game Description Silica is a dynamic alloy of action and a science fiction strategy that revolves around a fierce struggle for power over a Baltarus, a planet who is replete with quartz crystals, desired for all fractions. Players can manage their armies as commanders from orbit or plunge into battle with their heads as an infantry, vehicles or various insect -like aliens. Silica allows gamers to choose their game style without limiting them to specific rules.

item.title: Stranded: Alien Dawn
item.description: Game Description Stranded: Alien Dawn is an open world survival simulator. In this case, an alien. According to the plot, a group of people on a rescue shuttle is evacuated from a burning starship and landed on the first planet that fall. The player controls the team of surviving crew members of the space ship. He needs to take care of his wards, providing them with warmth, light, food, medicines, weapons, entertainment.

item.title: Total Conflict: Resistance
item.description: Game Description Total Conflict: Resistance is an incredible mixture of global strategy, tactics and an action in the first person that provides incredible battles, many types of armored vehicles, weapons and armor, as well as unique mechanics to immerse you in exciting gameplay. You have to take part in events, manage units, create your army and produce or purchase armored vehicles and weapons. You can also build fortifications, outposts and settlements, manage military operations in the first person, as well as in tactical mode.

item.title: Swirl Watch
item.description: Game Description Swirl Watch is a stealth scene of a horn, unfolding on a gas giant undergoing excessive operation. Players have to penetrate industrial complexes, bypass or neutralize protection vessels, committing corporate sabotage to create a resistance movement. In the dense atmosphere of the planet Cloud 2, ships find each other only in laser light, noise of engines and echolocation. This situation creates specific conditions for bypassing patrols and dismantling cloud processing stations.

item.title: Endgame of Devil
item.description: Game Description Endgame of Devil will put a player in the role of a devil who is entrusted with protecting the castle. The task is to stop the adventurers' units trying to take possession of treasures in your possessions. To do this, it is necessary to call on and command the servants to reflect the onslaught of the invaders. Combat clashes are automatic, moving the gameplay towards the strategic formation of the detachment before the battle.

item.title: Terra Nil
item.description: Game Description Terra Nil is a urban planning simulator, which uses pixel graphics with a large number of parts of the area. A feature of the project is that the player needs to build a settlement from scratch, without using factories and other buildings, that they can pollute the air, water spaces and the ground, having achieved the title of environmental place for residence for his creation. Starting with a randomly generated area, the gamer receives initial capital for the construction of the first residential buildings and various production, to provide residents with work.

item.title: Nucleares
item.description: Game Description Nucleares may be of interest to lovers of original projects and unusual indie-symptures. This is a simulator of an employee of a nuclear power plant with a first -person view. The character has arms, legs and torso. They can be seen if you lower the camera. The hero turns out to be the only employee at an experimental nuclear power plant for which large staff does not need. This object requires only one person, because artificial intelligence is responsible for everything else.

item.title: Barotrauma
item.description: Game Description Barotrauma is a two -dimensional simulator decorated in the style of the platformer. According to the plot, your courageous shoulders are entrusted to enter the captain of the real submarine, but you will not control it on the ground, but on one of the satellites of Jupiter called Europe, in the bowels of which the underground ocean spreads. The surface of the satellite is shrouded in an impassable radiation layer, due to which the colony of people are forced to hide under the thickness of the ice that protect the local waters.

item.title: Terraformers
item.description: Game Description Terraformers - 3x game with Roguelite elements, in which you are heading the terraforming of Mars. Get on the Red Planet, where there are no buildings of humanity. Use the resources of the environment and gradually expand your base, based on new cities, settlements and industrial territories. Start the process of terraforming by warming the planet, editing oceans and spreading life thanks to bacteria and brought creatures. Control the leaders and send them to mysterious places to open huge places rich in resources.

item.title: DREADFUL River
item.description: Game Description DREADFUL River is an arcade rafting simulator on the river on a raft with elements of role -playing play, action and tactics. The project was carried out in medieval setting. The plot tie begins with the attack of enemies on the kingdom. While the enemies are storming the castle, the king with a small group of the most faithful guards goes in search of an eternal crown, about which different legends go.

item.title: Caves of Lore
item.description: Game Description Caves of lore-role-playing game with two-dimensional pixel art style graphics and from above. Moving by locations occurs in real time. During the study of the area, you can neutralize traps, look for secrets and hack chests with loot. Equipment can be of different colors. Coloring depends on the rarity of the object. There are hundreds of things here. Battles with monsters are held in step -by -step mode. In battle, heroes can move around the cells.

item.title: Winter Falling: Battle Tactics
item.description: Game Description Winter Falling: Battle Tactics invites gamers to lead the troops and lead them to victory in the most stressful and tactical battles. And only your mind can save the dying world from devastation. You control a detachment of mercenaries, collect supplies and troops, perform tasks and even you can burn villages if you decide that you need it. But do not forget that all your actions have consequences.

item.title: Victoria 3
item.description: Game Description Victoria 3 is a direct sequel to the game of the same name, where the gamer will act in a time period from 1836 to 1936. In the manager’s simulator, Juzer is invited to choose one of the available countries, and manage it for the specified time. It will have to be controlled by political, demographic, economic processes, as well as try to pacify the layers of the population in order to build an ideal society.

item.title: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip
item.description: Game Description Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip - a continuation of the popular series of satirical adventure, the actions of which unfold in a fabulous universe. Instead of people, it is inhabited by various very cute monsters of all possible species and appearance. Unlike previous parts, here the developers do not focus on the simulation of dates, but on road travel and survival. Juzer needs to get to a certain epic place in order to end the campaign successfully.

item.title: Terra Invicta
item.description: Game Description Terra Invicta is a cosmic 4x strategy, the events of which develop in the distant future. Once, alien forces invaded our galaxy, dividing humanity into 7 factions. Each union saw its development of the future. You have to lead one of the seven ideologies to impose it to the whole world. Explore the solar system, expand the territories and fight enemies in tactical fights. The aliens invaded the far corner of the Kuiper ice belt.

item.title: After the Collapse
item.description: Game Description AFTER The COLLAPSE is a 2D strategy, a management and management simulator of its own settlement. A camera that is above above the surface at right angles is used. The surrounding world survived the apocalypse, which is why it turned into radioactive wastelands and became very dangerous for living people without means of protection against monsters and aggressive bandits. The task of the gamer is to develop existing buildings and build new ones to increase population growth and create a powerful army that is ready to fight off external threats.

item.title: Lost Branch of Legend
item.description: Game Description Touhou: Lost Branch of Legend will transfer you to the fantastic world of Genskoo. Create your deck using mana of different colors, and then fight with famous characters from the Touhou universe. In this Roguelike builder, there is a constant increase in mana from scattered exhibits, which makes each passage of the game unique. The game can boast of more than 500 unique bullet rains, which accurately recreate the frantic charm of Gennosoko.

item.title: Farthest Frontier
item.description: Game Description Farthest Frontier is a strategic game with the simulator elements. The game is made by all canons of 4x-mechanics. You have to develop your settlement and defend it from an attack by the enemy. Guide your people and try not only to survive, but also to develop. The world of wildlife is fraught with many dangers with which you have to face face every day. Collect resources, go hunting, do fishing or farming - do everything possible to survive in harsh and wild conditions.

item.title: Plateup!
item.description: Game Description Plateup! -This is an arcade simulator of cooking and restaurant control with elements of time management. This arcade is designed for cooperative passage. Multiplayer is available through a local network (LAN) and the Internet. There is also the opportunity to play together at the same computer. Single mode is also available. In this video game, users own a whole franchise. Each institution is a separate level. It randomly generates the conditions, climate and visitors.

item.title: Alchemia: Creatio ex nihilo
item.description: Game Description Alchemia: Creatio Ex Nihilo combines several genres. This is a head-headed game, a step-by-step strategy and a simplified corgorate. The action takes place in the fantasy world, where magic is adjacent to alchemy. The hero travels through the forgotten kingdom, finds artifacts (available 30 species), collects materials, opens recipes (there are 40 varieties here), crafts weapons from them and fights with its help with different monsters. The user can choose a route for his ward on a fork.

item.title: Strategic Command: American Civil War
item.description: Game Description Strategic Command: American Civil War is a new part of a small series of step -by -step strategies. The engine was improved in it. As the name implies, the continuation is dedicated to the civil war in America. The game transfers users to the 19th century. The developers created the largest card in the history of the franchise. It consists of 66,000 hexes and covers the entire North America from the Caribbean to Canada (and New Mexico).

item.title: Starship Troopers - Terran Command
item.description: Game Description Starship Troopers - Terran Command is a real -time strategy developed based on the Feature Film Star landing. Engage in the construction of the base, get resources and create an army to fight with giant insects living on a foreign planet. You need to colonize the hostile planet, which was suitable for the human race, but a huge number of hostile alien creatures live on its surface. Take the role of the leader of the Terran army.

item.title: Frozenheim
item.description: Game Description Frozenheim - a saga about the Vikings, in which the main character is expelled from his native lands, since blood feud tears his last name. He goes in search of a new home for himself and his loyal subjects. The harsh winter is approaching, and the clan needs to get to the shelter as quickly as possible. The construction of the settlement is a prolonged matter and the central character does not fit.

item.title: Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga
item.description: Game Description Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga tells about the events that erupted after the conflict between the Empire of Veridia and Tanra. They fought for a long time, and in the end all these events led to the fact that the first empire remained in losses. However, thanks to the young ruler of Florin, a shaky, but peace finally formed. Everyone began to gradually recover until something terrible happened.

item.title: Venture Towns
item.description: Game Description Venture Towns allows players to build a city landscape. This project transfers to the gamers the corporation forming a settlement. From the initial structures to vast skyscrapers, the player leads the development, striving for economic superiority. The game emphasizes the deliberate arrangement of various architectural elements, contributing to a systematic approach to urbanistic growth and current economic activity. In Venture Towns, the processes of the construction of objects open the ways for development.

item.title: Old World
item.description: Game Description Old World in the past was also known as 10 Crowns. The game is a step -by -step global strategy in the antique setting. The gameplay is strikingly different from the games of this genre: it is allowed to give several orders to Unit in one move. Such a resource as “orders” is responsible for additional moves. The more recognition points, the more moves can be made. The resource “Order” can be used in different ways: in battle, in construction, in events or diplomacy.

item.title: Coromon
item.description: Game Description Coromon is a role-playing indie adventure about taming animals for their further fights among themselves, according to the type of Pokemon. This project uses a rare pixel visual design as a tribute to the game industry of the last century. The camera is at an angle to create an isometric view of the world around the world, which is much more examined in this position. The single -user campaign of this game will take a gamer not for one day, and a thorough study will require even more free time.

item.title: Polimines
item.description: Game Description Thanks to** Polimines** you can try to swing your own intelligence, as well as strangle to strain your brains. Yes, this is a head-headed game in which the levels will need to go through the locations. But it will not be at all as easy as it might seem at first glance. Therefore, it will be necessary to make all your efforts, as well as understand the basic principle.

item.title: SCP: 5k
item.description: Game Description SCP: 5k - cooperative shooter in the first person with the elements of the horror. Play both alone and unite with friends. The game is represented by hardcore complexity. Particular attention is paid to the detailed environment and plot. The team can have up to four people. Go to a complex and saturated adventure! The story of SCP: 5k talks about how a foreign creature was discovered in the human psyche, which is responsible for all negative features: pain, cruelty, etc.

item.title: Idle Calibur
item.description: Game Description Idle Calibur combines a study of the open world with tactical RPG tactical and real -time mechanics in real time. The gameplay is focused on the construction of a city, which serves to recruit heroes with special abilities. Battles can be automatically due to IDLE function, or you can take direct manual control of your detachments during the fight. Key tasks include the collection of forces to attack other settlements on the world map and participate in structured tests with bosses for development.

item.title: Sands of Salzaar
item.description: Game Description Sands of Salzaar is a strategic game whose actions unfold in the Salzaara desert. Fight with numerous hostile factions, gathering your own army and developing your city. Choose your character, profession and faction, on whose side your army will have to fight. The eastern land is filled with various secrets and you have to solve them all. Sands of Salzaar events talk about an exotic old empire that once ruled the desert.

item.title: Fights in Tight Spaces
item.description: Game Description Fights in Tight Spaces - a mixture of a card game with a step -by -step strategy and animated battles made in classical setting. Here, a gamer will learn to build his own tactics in any conditions, knocking out the right cards and their location in order to win in battles. To create a deck in the game, there are 150 cards compiled taking into account the abilities of the enemy.

item.title: Mud and Blood
item.description: Game Description The rethought project MUD and Blood is a shootout between the two sides of the conflict, where the user has to observe the events. The setting transfers during the Second World War, where soldiers converge in battles. The updated engine and improved artificial intelligence allows you to try out the old classic flash game, filled with innovations in terms of functions and a graphic component that immerses gameplay into the process.

item.title: TimberBorn
item.description: Game Description TimberBorn allows you to develop a beaver colony. The game does not claim realism, because rodents behave and move like people. This is a full -fledged urban planning simulator. The settlement has to rebuild in the world where humanity has disappeared, leaving behind the exhausted land. In an alternative future, the planet suffers from drought. To control the water resource in TimberBorn, you can build dams and dig channels.

item.title: City Game Studio: A Tycoon ABOUT GAME DEV
item.description: Game Description City Game Studio: A Tycoon ABOUT GAME DEV is a strategic simulator in which it is important not only to chase the demand of players, but also be able to reduce expenses and vice versa, be able to spend money where they are actually needed. Games developers presented a simulator in which you will have to develop a company that develops games. A small studio creating video games decided to expand, so you must make every effort to create a whole headquarters of developers who can satisfy the needs of modern gamers.

item.title: The Doors of Trithius
item.description: Game Description The Doors of Trithius is a RPG -Rogalik in the fantasy world with procedurally generated content. Here you have to fight monsters, avoid traps, collect prey and much more, traveling along the mysterious world of Enalia. Every time you start the game, you have to explore the new generated city, dungeon and map of the world. Movement and battle use a unique time system, returning the priority of the player based on the speed of weapons or action, maintaining tactical decisions, as well as knowledge about your enemies.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesctor
item.description: Game Description The step-by-step strategy Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector transfers to the world of the future of the 41st millennium. It is required to collect their military units, build up strength, develop leaders' abilities and enter into a stressful confrontation, controlling destructive weapons. It is necessary to go through a rich plot campaign of 20 unique tasks. History is devoted to the devastation of the Vaal continent. It is required, together with Sergeant Carleon and his allies, cleanse Baal for a second of the influence of tyranids.

item.title: Mini MotorWays
item.description: Game Description Mini MotorWays - Top -Daw Simulator, which allows you to develop the city, building buildings, infrastructure, roads, etc. It is necessary to build a huge metropolis, filling it with highways, highways, in various ways, etc. It is important to create the best option to avoid traffic jams and accidents. The problem of urban traffic is the most important question for any mayor. The Mini MotorWays game process is a real puzzle in which it is necessary to solve the problem with the movement of transport.

item.title: The Fermi Paradox
item.description: Game Description The Fermi Paradox is a fantastic setting strategy. The gameplay is focused on choosing a plot, which will affect the player’s decisions, the place of travel and presented civilizations. It is necessary to conduct races and types of creatures through tens of centuries, helping them to study the expanses of the universe, establish contacts with other living organisms and create harmony. Being the ruler of an alien civilization, you will need to direct them to prosperity, help survive, collect radio signals from long stars and make contact with new races.

item.title: Going Medieval
item.description: Game Description Going Medieval is a simulator in which you need to build a fortress on the ruins of an old castle and equip it to protect your settlement. Any event can affect the mood of your people, so you need to satisfy all their needs and be a good king. Events unfold in the era of the dark Middle Ages of the late XIV century. Only five percent of the population survived after a heavy plague epidemic.

item.title: Across the Obelisk
item.description: Game Description Across the Obelisk is a cooperative game with role -playing elements and collecting its own deck. The gameplay presents a single and multi -user regime. Participants choose a variety of heroes, open access to new items and cards, creating a set of characters. After that, you have to fight monsters and bosses in deep tactical contractions. Features of Across the Obelisk: Dynamic assembly of decks in the Roguelite style, where each card improves by different items, increased level or other methods.

item.title: Element TD 2
item.description: Game Description Element TD 2 is a strategy in the style of “protection of a tower” with competitive elements. Events unfold in a fantastic world, where the player will use six main elements: nature, earth, fire, light, darkness and water. Before passing, you will need to choose several elements that determine the type of towers and abilities. At the start of the match, a certain amount of funds for which buildings are installed is issued.

item.title: Eximius: Seize the Frontline
item.description: Game Description EXIMIUS: Seize the Frontline is a first -person shooter with real -time strategy elements. The multiplayer game consists in battles of 5 by 5, where 4 people act as officers on the front line and one commander acting as a support and giving orders. Cards for battles are represented by various cities in the world of post -apocalypse. When playing for the commander, you need to build a base, train your fighters and help allied organizations.

item.title: Empire of Sin
item.description: Game Description Empire of Sin is a strategy whose actions unfold in Chicago of the 1920s. A dry law has been introduced, which means that the time is for the heyday of crime and smuggling. Being a boss of the criminal world, take the Office of one of the 14 groups. Many characters are based on real prototypes of gangsters such as Al Capone, Stefani Saint-Claire or Goldi Garno. Your tasks include building a whole criminal empire.

item.title: Easy Red 2
item.description: Game Description Easy Red 2 is a first -person shooter with elements of a strategy that immerses in an authentic atmosphere of World War II. The gameplay can plunge into tense and cruel battles, where the main thing is planning and tactics. The gameplay relies on realism. Take a break through the tanks and the enemy’s huge army. Do not fall into the explosion zone and look for ways to survive on the battlefield with your partners.

item.title: Kingdoms Reborn
item.description: Game Description Kingdoms Reborn is a urban planning simulator with a full multipleor and card game elements. The project was primarily created under the online, but there is also a single in it. The world is randomly generated. It is divided into 7 biomes that do not gameplay. In the Arctic zone and tropics, it will be more difficult to grow food on ordinary fields than in the territory with a temperate climate.

item.title: Endless Furry Killer 2020
item.description: Game Description The conflict in Endless Furry Killer 2020 puts a player against the endless waves of anthropomorphic opponents. The gamer has to move through two -dimensional arenas with a view of the top intended for continuous battles. The key lesson lies in the shooting of goals in a tense struggle for life with a constant stream of enemies. Such a gameplay requires constant movement and aiming to defeat non -aloscorizing resistance.

item.title: Wingspan (Wings)
item.description: Game Description Wingspan (wings) - a collectible card game based on the same tough. The version for personal computers is designed for a session of one to five people. Players are assigned the role of ornithologists involved in studying new species of birds and trying to collect and bring as many rare individuals as possible to the natural reserve. Gathering in the world of various birds, more points go to those who will be able to get a unique and dying look.

item.title: Empyrion - Galactic Survival
item.description: Game Description Empyrion - Galactic Survival shows the world of the future. In the 24th century, in the ice of Antarctica, they find a spacecraft of aliens. Scientists investigated the object and discovered the technology of the hyperdrod. Earthlings send an expedition to the planet Empirion, which is in the Andromeda nebula. The crew gets to the destination, but tolerates the crash and cannot return home. In survival mode, the player leaves the rescue capsule and is alone against the hostile world.

item.title: Baldi's Basics Plus
item.description: Game Description Baldi’s Basics Plus - a parody of the first -person horror and educational games of the 90s. All levels are randomly generated, and mini-games are made in bright colors and allow you to go to nature. Baldi’s Basics Plus is an extended version of the original game containing more objects and characters. The game contains a huge number of strange characters and useful objects necessary for passing. Exploring the confusing corridors of Baldie’s school, the hero will come across many random and hilarious events.

item.title: Ostriv
item.description: Game Description OSTRIV, this is a city -building simulator that makes you the ruler of the monarch of the 18th century. The player will have to work hard and show his ability to the manager, as well as creative abilities. The goal of the game to transfer the gameplay of simulators of this kind to a new level, by means of adding a huge number of opportunities and abandoning the usual restrictions.

item.title: Panzer Corps 2
item.description: Game Description Plunge into a new type of step -by -step strategies in Panzer Corps 2. The game tells about terrible events during the Second World War. You have to play a key role, taking a large army under command. This is easy to master the gameplay, and the outcome of the battles will depend only on the correct moves, not the reaction. Players can take control of any European country and create their own army of thousands of various units.

item.title: Hex of Steel
item.description: Game Description Players in Hex of Steel have to go during the Second World War, where you will have to control the troops on land, water and in the air. The project is a full -scale Vargam, where you have to perform step -by -step actions on the global map of the world, which includes Europe, Africa and the Pacific regions. Users will be able to fight against AI in a single campaign or special historical scenarios, as well as in the cross -platform mode of PBEM and multiplayer skirmishes against other users (there is the possibility of cooperative passage).

item.title: Stoneshard
item.description: Game Description Come in the role of a harsh mercenary in a harsh, ruined war, kingdom. Take part in step -by -step battles and examine the RPG elements of Stoneshard, available in the gameplay. You can perform contracts, secondary and plot missions. Heal the wounds, purchase equipment and improve the protagonist as soon as you wish. Freely move around the big and seamless world. Explore the villages lying in the ruins, go down to the dungeons or look into abandoned tracts.

item.title: Ai War 2
item.description: Game Description In AI WAR 2, an even more advanced version of AI captured the entire galaxy, and left only a tiny planet to the player. It’s time to strike and outwit the enemy. This will come in handy new capabilities, large flotillas and hacking skills. Or you can get involved in a much more confusing galactic struggle. On the agenda - macrophages, Dyson spheres, nanocosts and much more. Each faction has its own goal, its own rules, units and a completely unique economy.

item.title: Police Stories
item.description: Game Description John Reims and Rick Jones are two brave cops trying to put the streets of his hometown in order. Police Stories is a story full of intrigues and conspiracies. Having learned the motives of some heroes, a terrible truth will open. But on the way to the answers, many hostages have to be saved, kill the pack of bandits and neutralize a huge number of bombs. Police Stories implemented mechanics:

item.title: Microtown
item.description: Game Description Microtown is a urban planning simulator in which you will control your own settlement. Build the village of your dreams, lead it inhabitants and try to expand your possessions in order to become the most prosperous settlement on all land. Microtown’s gameplay is emphasized on production chains. You begin your way as a small village, gradually expanding to a huge city. Explore the surrounding territories, collect and process resources to not only improve the city, but also provide a happy life for your settlers.

item.title: Steel Division 2
item.description: Game Description Steel Division 2 is a real -time strategy, during which you will visit the role of Army General during the Bagration Operation. The plot was established during the Second World War on the Eastern Front, and there are thousands of fighters under your command. Thanks to an extensive list of opportunities, the gameplay can take you tens of hours. Pass the plot missions or participate in free mode in a multi -user or single game.

item.title: Pixark
item.description: Game Description Pixark is made in the style of the famous Maycraft, but the game has a good plot, which is revealed in different ways for each player. The world of wildlife includes more than 100 different creatures that we can clone, tame and use for our own purposes. Among them will be friendly inhabitants of the jungle, as well as aggressive representatives of the game world. The mysterious lands made in the form of cubes are destroyed and built every minute.

item.title: Galaxy Truckker: Extended Edition
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Truckker: Extended Edition - a strategy about truckers from distant space. The gameplay was based on the same tough. You will build cosmic shuttles, evade asteroids and enter into battle with a huge number of enemies. The main task is to earn as many cosmicredites as possible. The life of a cosmic trucker is not easy. The Galaxy Truckker game process: Extended Edition offers a branch scenario, the events of which depend on your moral elections.

item.title: Parkitect
item.description: Game Description The game is a simulator where the construction of the amusement park will be the main task. Parkitect surpasses the rest of the games of this genre due to tactical management, the economic component and entertainment, which the player can only dream of. Initially, you are given a small plot of land and a few resources. Your task, as a manager of this park, invite as many people as possible.

item.title: X4: Foundations
item.description: Game Description In X4: Foundations you can create any spaceship, and then sit down for its helm and start to smash the enemies right and left. The first -person shooter with RPG and sandboxes combines several temporary eras enclosed in a couple of hours of game, but it is impossible to enjoy the gameplay of this project even in a week. You can construct ships of different sizes and goals. It can be small scouts and large ships, wearing several hundred combat birds on their huge backs.

item.title: The Colonists
item.description: Game Description The Colonists are a urban planning sandbox in which you control a team of robots that create themselves. In the game you do not have to fight or kill enemies. The plot side of the project is meditative. You are landing on the planet, begin to carry out non -difficult tasks in which you need to build a settlement, and then improve your town depending on the preferences. Also in the game there is a “free mode” - here you make an island yourself, plant robots, begin to build a city from the resources obtained.

item.title: Terraforming Mars
item.description: Game Description Terraforming Mars is an official adaptation of the board game popular behind the ocean about the colonization of Mars and the transformation of this planet into suitable humanity habitat. The video game is presented in the form of a step -by -step strategy, where a sufficient amount of time is provided to think about further actions in order to extract maximum benefits. Game options are available both against artificial intelligence with several levels of complexity, and against people using the Internet, local network or one personal computer at a personal meeting of players.

item.title: Mashinky
item.description: Game Description The strategic simulator - Mashinky - about how to create your own network of trains and cars that will bring you money, and in return you can modernize or send them to rest when buying new equipment. Around you are beautiful landscapes of the Czech Republic, Poland, Germany and England. The sun sits down, and floods the evening light of the forest and fields, granting nightlife to residents. In the game, a system of day, night and time in general is thought out.

item.title: On the Western Front
item.description: Game Description On the Western Front - this is a tactical strategy, the action of which unfolds against the background of the First World War, namely on the infamous Western Front. Users take on the role of the division commander, who are instructed to manage various aspects of military operations in one of the most exhausting and complex periods in history. The Title emphasizes the harsh realities of the trench war, where the soldiers are faced with many problems, from the constant threat of enemy fire to the constant need to manage resources.

item.title: Mad Restaurant People
item.description: Game Description Mad Restaurant People makes it possible to feel all the difficulty of working as a waiter. The game is presented with a top distance, which makes it possible to observe the entire hall at once. Take orders, serve customers, serve dishes in time, count the guests and much more. Mad Restaurant People is a full -fledged waiter’s simulator who will not let you relax for a second. The gameplay requires attentiveness, reaction speed, good memory and many other important qualities.

item.title: Zero-K
item.description: Game Description Zero-K is a real-time strategy. The indie project allows for large-scale battles on land, water and in the air. This RTS has worked out physics and ballistics. During the battles, the landscape changes. You can even level the soil to your tactical needs. The game allows you to create funnels for enemy tanks, digging ditches and erecting embankments, hiding fighters behind the hills so that they are not taken by enemy shells, dig water channels for the passage of their fleet through land, put a soldier on a hill for better visibility and increase the range of shooting.

item.title: Tower of Time
item.description: Game Description At sunset, artara gradually open up new horizons of another world. Thousands of pages of books, manuscripts and video stations tell us the plot of Tower of Time through the prism of distant views on the plot from the game character. The new system in the RPG game is revealed from the first minutes of gameplay. We create a unique character who does not know what is happening in his world.

item.title: Farm Manager 2018
item.description: Game Description Farm Manager 2018 is a simulator for building your own farm, where the territory of your competitors will slowly go into your possessions. A change of day and nights was added to the game. Also, such cultures as cucumbers, apples, strawberries and other varieties were added to the new part. If you are tired of growing simple wheat or oats, then you can definitely change the direction, but do not forget to monitor the economy.

item.title: Through The Ages
item.description: Game Description Through The Ages is a port of a cult board game adapted to personal computers. Compared to the original party in the digital version, they take much less time. Instead of 4-8 hours, a maximum of 1 hour takes the game session, since the computer is engaged in all calculations. According to its concept, Through The Ages resembles the Titles of the Civilization series. Only here development occurs using various cards.

item.title: Bio Inc. Redemption
item.description: Game Description Bio Inc. Redemption is a biomedical simulator where a player has to choose life or death. These are 2 main regimes where you need to perform a variety of tasks. You are able to create deadly diseases, mocking a person presented on the screen. Or put on the medic’s mask and find the virus, look for the vaccine and save the infected ones. The gameplay provides more than 600 diseases existing in the real world, accurate symptoms, diagnostic tests and various ways of treatment for each virus.

item.title: Northgard
item.description: Game Description The Scandinavian strategy of Northgard with a deepening into the ancient mythology of the Vikings, which found Nordgard - a city full of wealth, myths and ancient legends. The game combines the peaceful graphics and the gradual development of your settlement. However, the Vikings quickly cooled their ardor when they met with the first danger of Northgard - a brutal cold enveloping all the shores and heart of the island.

item.title: Grey Hack
item.description: Game Description The multi -user game Grey Hack makes it possible to feel like a professional hacker. The player is accessible to complete freedom of action as a procedurally generated world web network. At the beginning of the game, only a few programs are available, including File Explorer, Text Editor and Terminal. As a hacker skill grows, many new utilities will appear and a wide range of opportunities will open.

item.title: Brigand: Oaxaca
item.description: Game Description Brigand: Oaxaca is a first -person shooter hybrid, immersive simulator and role -playing game. The project has three -dimensional low -polygonal graphics. Due to her, the title resembles computer action of the late 90s and early 2000s. The action takes place in a world where nuclear apocalypse happened. Events unfold on the territory of the Mexican state of Ohak. Indi-game combines elements of different settings. In it, the gunshot weapons are adjacent to Voodoo magic, and not only mutters, but also demons roam the wastelands.

item.title: Revhead
item.description: Game Description In the REVHEAD car racing simulator, the user will have to design his own car. The protagonist has a friend named Charlie who is well versed in creating cars. He invites the central character to Australia to help him with something. It will be necessary to win the competition and get recognition from Charlie, then it will create improved transport. There is an opportunity to sell and buy cars, as well as trade in various details and customization items.

item.title: Software Inc.
item.description: Game Description Software Inc. - An economic simulator that allows the development of a company engaged in the development of software. Initially, it is required to build an office building, buy inexpensive equipment and hire several employees, distributing tasks between them. To get funding, at first the newly made team will take on third -party projects and various simple tasks. As the budget becomes more, the staff will be more experienced and new faces will come, it will also be possible to engage in the external design of the facade, build beautiful paths and decor items to give the office a presentable look.

item.title: Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game
item.description: Game Description Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game is the simulator of the owner of the car concerns. A good product if you like to disassemble and redo cars in your own way. To design a car starting from the engine and ending with the suspension, body, as well as other parts. In this game there is a company where we will be the head of the campaign for the production of machines and will be part of the market from the end of World War II and now on our days.

item.title: Dynasty Warriors 8 Empires
item.description: Game Description Alone, fighting thousands of enemies, and using the strategy and tactics of battles, the Dynasty Warriors 8 Empires player will be able to win all ancient China. There is no specific plot, but only scenarios, during which you can play in a certain period of time. In each of the episodes there is a separate distribution of territories, a set of heroes, which is at the start of the battle on the unification of the lands of China.

item.title: Dungeonmans
item.description: Game Description Dungeonmans The Heroic Adventure Roguelike - a traditional horned in which you explore the dungeons, fight with a variety of monsters and collect lutus. You have to develop your academy in order to open new opportunities and skills. Go to the adventure and take part in step -by -step battles. A fascinating fantasy story awaits you, telling about the confrontation of good and evil. Gameplay Dungeonmans The Heroic Adventure Roguelike:

item.title: Craft the World
item.description: Game Description Craft the World is an adventure 2D game that combines multiple elements. You can explore the procedurally generated worlds, build locks and fortresses, fight with hostile creatures and get materials necessary for numerous crafts. Manage the dwarf tribe and lead them the way you want. The player can send his wards to extract resources, build structures or fight with opponents. But, not everything is so simple. You have to put them on, help in battles and feed them in time.

item.title: Gems of War - Puzzle RPG
item.description: Game Description Gems of War - Puzzle RPG is a mixture of role -playing game and casual puzzle in the spirit of “three in a row” with KKI elements. Title came to a PC from mobile devices. The project has a single and multiplayer content. There is a PVP with a rating system, online tournaments, contractions with mobs, weekly events, quests, guilds, events for several players, mini-games, a story campaign where history is given through dialogue inserts.

item.title: Calyx
item.description: Game Description Calyx is a real -time strategy that puts a player at the head of a remote space operation to mining.
